h4.p: [03] tattha jinasaasanaadhigamassa akkharakosallamuulakattaa ta.m sampaadetabbanti dassetu.m abhidheyyappayojanavaakyamidamuccate.

[03] yo koci lokiyalokuttaraadibhedo vacanattho, so sabbo akkhareheva sa~n~naayate. sithiladhanitaadiakkharavipattiya~nhi atthassa dunnayataa hoti, tasmaa ^a^M0.0002^ea^ akkharakosalla.m bahuupakaara.m buddhavacanesu, ettha padaanipi akkharasannipaataruupattaa akkharesveva sa"ngayhanti.

[03] akkharaa api aadayo ekacattaaliisa.m, te ca kho jinavacanaanuruupaa akaaraadayo niggahiitantaa ekacattaaliisamattaa va.n.naa pacceka.m akkharaa naama honti. ta.m yathaa -- aa i ii u uu e o, ka kha ga gha "na, ca cha ja jha ~na, .ta .tha .da .dha .na, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha .la a.m-iti akkharaa.

[03] nakkharantiiti ^b^akkharaa,^eb^ a aadi yesa.m te ^b^aadayo^eb^. akaaraadiinamanukkamo panesa .thaanaadikkamasannissito, tathaa hi .thaanakara.nappayatanehi va.n.naa jaayante, tattha ^b^cha .thaanaani^eb^ ka.n.thataalumuddhadantao.t.thanaasikaavasena.
[03] ^b^kara.na.m^eb^ jivhaamajjha.m taalujaana.m, jivhopagga.m muddhajaana.m, jivhaagga.m dantajaana.m, sesaa saka.t.thaanakara.naa.

[03] ^b^payatana.m^eb^ sa.mvutaadikara.naviseso. sa.mvutatta^b^ma^eb^kaarassa, viva.tatta.m sesasaraana.m ^b^sa^eb^kaara^b^ha^eb^kaaraana~nca, phu.t.tha.m vaggaana.m, iisa.mphu.t.tha.m yaralavaananti.
[03] eva.m .thaanakara.nappayatanasutikaalabhinnesu akkharesu saraa nissayaa, itare nissitaa. tattha --
[21] nissayaado saraa vuttaa, bya~njanaa nissitaa tato.
[03] tattha tesu akkharesu ^b^a^eb^kaaraadiisu ^b^o^eb^kaarantaa a.t.tha akkharaa saraa naama honti. ta.m yathaa -- a aa i ii u uu ^b^e^eb^ o-iti saraa.
[03] o anto yesa.m te ^b^odantaa, da^eb^kaaro sandhijo, saranti gacchantiiti ^b^saraa,^eb^ bya~njane saarentiitipi ^b^saraa^eb^.
[03] tattha a.t.thasu saresu lahumattaa tayo saraa rassaa naama honti. ta.m yathaa -- a i u-iti rassaa.

[03] lahukaa mattaa pamaa.na.m yesa.m te ^b^lahumattaa, mattaa^eb^saddo cettha accharaasa"nghaataakkhinimiilanasa"nkhaata.m kaala.m vadati, taaya mattaaya ^b^e^eb^kamattaa ^b^rassaa,^eb^ dvimattaa ^b^diighaa,^eb^ a.d.dhamattaa ^b^bya~njanaa. lahu^eb^ggaha.na~ncettha chandasi diya.d.dhamattassaapi gaha.nattha.m. rassakaalayogato ^b^rassaa,^eb^ rassakaalavanto vaa ^b^rassaa^eb^.
[03] tattha a.t.thasu saresu rassehi a~n~ne dvimattaa pa~nca saraa diighaa naama honti. ta.m yathaa -- aa ii uu e o-iti diighaa.

[03] ^b^a~n~na^eb^ggaha.na.m diya.d.dhamattikaanampi sa"ngaha.nattha.m. diighakaale niyuttaa, tabbanto vaa ^b^diighaa^eb^. kvaci sa.myogapubbaa ekaarokaaraa rassaa iva vuccante. yathaa -- ettha, seyyo, o.t.tho, sotthi. ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? ma.m ce tva.m nikha.na.m vane. putto tyaaha.m mahaaraaja.
[03] dvinna.m samuuho ^b^du,^eb^ tasmi.m dumhi. sa.myogabhuute akkhare pare yo pubbo rassakkharo, so garusa~n~no hoti. yathaa -- datvaa, hitvaa, bhutvaa.
[03] diigho ca saro garusa~n~no hoti. yathaa -- naavaa, nadii, vadhuu, dve, tayo. garukato a~n~no ``lahuko''ti veditabbo.

[03] .thapetvaa a.t.tha sare sesaa a.d.dhamattaa akkharaa ^b^ka^eb^kaaraadayo niggahiitantaa tetti.msa bya~njanaa naama honti. vuttehi a~n~ne ^b^sesaa^eb^. bya~njiiyati etehi atthoti ^b^bya~njanaa^eb^. ta.m yathaa -- ka kha ga gha "na, ca cha ja jha ~na, .ta .tha .da .dha .na, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha .la a.m-iti bya~njanaa. ^b^ka^eb^kaaraadiisvakaaro uccaara.nattho.

[03] tesa.m kho bya~njanaana.m ^b^ka^eb^kaaraadayo ^b^ma^eb^kaarantaa pa~ncaviisati bya~njanaa pa~ncapa~ncavibhaagena vaggaa naama honti. ta.m yathaa -- ka kha ga gha "na, ca cha ja jha ~na, .ta .tha .da .dha .na, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma-iti vaggaa.

[03] te pana pa.thamakkharavasena ^b^ka^eb^vagga^b^ca^eb^vaggaadivohaara.m gataa, ^b^vaggo^eb^ti samuuho, tattha pa~ncapa~ncavibhaagenaati vaa pa~nca pa~nca etesamatthiiti ^a^M0.0006^ea^ vaa ^b^pa~ncapa~ncaso,^eb^ mo anto yesa.m te ^b^mantaa^eb^.

[03] ^b^a^eb^kaaro uccaara.nattho, ^b^iti^eb^saddo panaanantaravuttanidassanattho, a.miti ya.m ^b^a^eb^kaarato para.m vutta.m bindu, ta.m niggahiita.m naama hoti. rassassara.m nissaaya gayhati, kara.na.m niggahetvaa gayhatiiti vaa ^b^niggahiita.m^eb^.
[03] idha avuttaana.m parasama~n~naanampi payojane sati gaha.nattha.m paribhaasamaaha.
[03] yaa ca pana parasmi.m sakkataganthe, paresa.m vaa veyyaakara.naana.m sama~n~naa ghosaaghosalopasava.n.nasa.myogali"ngaadikaa, taa payoge sati etthaapi yujjante.
[03] parasmi.m, paresa.m vaa sama~n~naa ^b^parasama~n~naa,^eb^ veyyaakara.ne, veyyaakara.namadhiitaana.m vaa sama~n~naatyattho. payujjana.m ^b^payogo,^eb^ viniyogo.
[03] tattha vaggaana.m pa.thamadutiyaa, ^b^sa^eb^kaaro ca ^b^aghosaa^eb^. vaggaana.m tatiyacatutthapa~ncamaa, ya ra lava ha .laa caati ekaviisati ^b^ghosaa^eb^ naama.

[03] ettha ca vaggaana.m dutiyacatutthaa ^b^dhanitaa^eb^tipi vuccanti, itare ^b^sithilaa^eb^ti. vinaaso ^b^lopo^eb^. rassassaraa sakadiighehi a~n~nama~n~na.m ^b^sava.n.naa^eb^ naama, ye ^b^saruupaa^eb^tipi vuccanti. saraanantaritaani ^a^M0.0007^ea^ bya~njanaani ^b^sa.myogo^eb^. dhaatuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthava.m ^b^li"nga.m^eb^. vibhatyanta.m ^b^pada.m^eb^. iccevamaadi.

[03] loka aggapuggalo, pa~n~naa indriya.m, tii.ni imaani, no hi eta.m, bhikkhunii ovaado, maatu upa.t.thaana.m, sametu aayasmaa, abhibhuu aayatana.m, dhanaa me atthi, sabbe eva, tayo assu dhammaa, asanto ettha na dissanti itiidha saraadisa~n~naaya.m sabbasandhikara.na.t.thaane bya~njanaviyojanattha.m paribhaasamaaha.

[03] ^b^sarenaa^eb^ti nissakke kara.navacana.m, sahayoge vaa, sandhitabbe sarasahita.m pubbabya~njana.m anatikkamanto adho.thitamassara~nca katvaa sarato viyojayeti sarato bya~njana.m viyojetabba.m. ettha ca ^b^assara^eb^ggaha.nasaamatthiyena ``bya~njana''nti laddha.m.

[03] saraa kho sabbepi sare pare .thite lopa.m papponti. ^b^lopo^eb^ti adassana.m anuccaara.na.m. ettha ^b^saraa^eb^ti kaariyiiniddeso. ^b^bahuvacana.m^eb^ panettha ekekasmi.m sare pare bahuuna.m lopa~naapanattha.m. ^b^sare^eb^ti nimittaniddeso, nimittasattamii caaya.m, nimittopaadaanasaamatthiyato va.n.nakaalabyavadhaane sandhikaariya.m na hoti. ^b^lopa^eb^nti kaariyaniddeso, ida.m pana sutta.m ^a^M0.0008^ea^ upari paralopavidhaanato pubbalopavidhaananti da.t.thabba.m, eva.m sabbattha sattamiiniddese pubbasseva vidhi, na parassa vidhaananti veditabba.m.

[03] sararahita.m kho bya~njana.m adho.thita.m parakkhara.m naye yutte .thaaneti paranayana.m kaatabba.m. ettha ^b^yutta^eb^ggaha.na.m niggahiitanisedhanattha.m, tena ``akkocchi ma.m avadhi ma''ntiaadiisu paranayanasandeho na hoti.
[03] lokaggapuggalo, pa~n~nindriya.m, tii.nimaani, noheta.m, bhikkhunovaado, maatupa.t.thaana.m, sametaayasmaa, abhibhaayatana.m, dhanaa matthi, sabbeva, tayassu dhammaa, asantettha na dissanti.

[03] yassa idaani, sa~n~naa iti, chaayaa iva, kathaa eva kaa, iti api, assama.nii asi, cakkhu indriya.m, akata~n~nuu asi, aakaase iva, te api, vande aha.m, so aha.m, cattaaro ime, vasalo iti, moggallaano aasi biijako, paato evaatiidha pubbalope sampatte ``sare''ti adhikaaro, idha pana ``atthavasaa vibhattivipari.naamo''ti katvaa ``saro, saramhaa, lopa''nti ca vattamaane --

[03] asamaanaruupamhaa saramhaa paro saro lopa.m pappoti vaa. samaana.m ruupa.m assaati saruupo, na saruupo ^b^asaruupo,^eb^ asava.n.no ^a^M0.0009^ea^. yasmaa pana mariyaadaaya.m, abhividhimhi ca vattamaano ^b^aa^eb^upasaggo viya ^b^vaa^eb^saddo dvidhaa vattate, katthaci vikappe, katthaci yathaavavatthitaruupapariggahe, idha pana pacchime, tato niccamaniccamasanta~nca vidhimettha ^b^vaa^eb^saddo diipeti. ``naye para.m yutte''ti para.m netabba.m.

[03] yassadaani yassa idaani, sa~n~naati sa~n~naa iti, chaayaava chaayaa iva, kathaava kaa kathaa eva kaa, itiipi iti api, assama.niisi assama.nii asi. cakkhundriya miti nicca.m. akata~n~nuusi akata~n~nuu asi, aakaaseva aakaase iva, tepi te api, vandeha.m vande aha.m, soha.m so aha.m, cattaarome cattaaro ime, vasaloti vasalo iti, moggallaanosi biijako moggallaano aasi biijako, paatova paato eva.
[03] idha na bhavati -- pa~ncindriyaani, saddhindriya.m, sattuttamo, ekuunaviisati, yassete, sugatovaado, di.t.thaasavo, di.t.thogho, cakkhaayatana.m, ta.m kutettha labbhaa iccaadi.

[03] bandhussa iva, upa ikkhati, upa ito, ava icca, jina iirita.m, na upeti, canda udayo, yathaa udake itiidha pubbaava.n.nassaraana.m ^a^M0.0010^ea^ lope kate ``paro, asaruupe''ti ca vattate, tathaa ``iva.n.no ya.m navaa''ti ito ^b^iva.n.na^eb^ggaha.na~nca, ``vamodudantaana''nti ito ^b^u^eb^ggaha.na~nca siihagatiyaa idhaanuvattetabba.m.

[03] ^b^i^eb^va.n.nabhuuto, ^b^u^eb^kaarabhuuto ca paro saro asaruupe pubbassare lutte kvaci asava.n.na.m pappoti. natthi sava.n.naa etesanti ^b^asava.n.naa,^eb^ ekaarokaaraa, tattha .thaanaasannavasena iva.n.nukaaraanamekaarokaaraa honti.

[03] bandhusseva, upekkhati, upeto, avecca, jinerita.m, nopeti, candodayo, yathodake. ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? tatrime, yassindriyaani, mahiddhiko, sabbiitiyo, tenupasa"nkami, lokuttaro. ^b^lutte^eb^ti ki.m? cha ime dhammaa, yathaa ida.m, kusalassa upasampadaa. ^b^asaruupe^eb^ti ki.m? cattaarimaani, maatupa.t.thaana.m.

[03] ettha ca satipi he.t.thaa ^b^vaa^eb^ggaha.ne ^b^kvaci^eb^kara.nato ava.n.ne eva lutte idha vuttavidhi hotiiti da.t.thabba.m. tato idha na bhavati -- di.t.thupaadaana.m, pa~ncahupaali, mudindriya.m, yo missaroti.

[03] tatra aya.m, buddha anussati, sa atthikaa, pa~n~navaa assa, tadaa aha.m, yaani idha bhuutaani, gacchaami iti, ati ito, kikii iva, bahu upakaara.m, madhu udaka.m, su upadhaarita.m, yopi aya.m ^a^M0.0011^ea^, idaani aha.m, sace aya.m, appassuto aya.m, itara itarena, saddhaa idha vitta.m, kamma upanissayo, tathaa upama.m, ratti uparato, vi upasamo iccatra pubbassaraana.m lope kate --
[03] saro kho paro pubbassare lutte kvaci diighabhaava.m pappotiiti .thaanaasannavasena rassassaraana.m sava.n.nadiigho.

[03] tatraaya.m, buddhaanussati, saatthikaa, pa~n~navaassa, tadaaha.m, yaaniidha bhuutaani, gacchaamiiti, atiito, kikiiva, ^b^ba^eb^huupakaara.m, madhuudaka.m, suupadhaarita.m, yopaaya.m, idaanaaha.m, sacaaya.m, appassutaaya.m, itariitarena, saddhiidha vitta.m, kammuupanissayo, tathuupama.m, rattuuparato, vuupasamo.

[03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? acira.m vata'ya.m kaayo, kimpimaaya, tii.nimaani, pa~ncasupaadaanakkhandhesu, tassattho, pa~nca"ngiko, munindo, satindriya.m, lahu.t.thaana.m, gacchaamaha.m, tatrida.m, pa~ncahupaali, nattha~n~na.m. ^b^lutte^eb^ti ki.m? yathaa aya.m, nimi iva raajaa, kikii iva, su upadhaarita.m.
[03] lokassa ^a^M0.0012^ea^ iti, deva iti, vi ati patanti, vi ati naamenti, sa"nghaa.ti api, jiivitahetu api, vijju iva, ki.msu idha vitta.m, saadhu iti itiidha parassaraana.m lope kate --
[03] pubbo saro parassare lutte kvacidiigha.m pappoti. ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.na.m luttadiighaggaha.naanuka.d.dhanattha.m, ta.m ^b^``caa^eb^nuka.d.dhitamuttaratra naanuvattate''ti ~naapanattha.m.
[03] lokassaati, devaati, viitipatanti, viitinaamenti, sa"nghaa.tiipi, jiivitahetuupi, vijjuuva, ki.msuudha vitta.m, saadhuuti.
[03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? yassadaani, itissa, idaanipi, tesupi, cakkhundriya.m, kinnumaava.
[03] adhigato kho me aya.m dhammo, putto te aha.m, te assa pahiinaa, pabbate aha.m, ye assa itiidha pubbalope sampatte --

[03] ekaarassa padantabhuutassa .thaane sare pare kvaci ^b^ya^eb^kaaraadeso hoti. ^b^a^eb^kaaremeteyesaddaadissevaaya.m vidhi, ^b^ya^eb^nti ya.m ruupa.m, e eva anto ^b^edanto,^eb^ aadesi.t.thaane aadissatiiti ^b^aadeso^eb^. ``bya~njane''ti adhikicca ``diigha''nti diigho.
[03] adhigato ^a^M0.0013^ea^ kho myaaya.m dhammo, putto tyaaha.m, tyaassa pahiinaa, pabbatyaaha.m, yyaassa.
[03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? te naagataa, puttaa matthi. ^b^anta^eb^ggaha.na.m ki.m? dhammacakka.m pavattento, damento citta.m.

[03] yaavatako assa kaayo, taavatako assa byaamo, ko attho, atha kho assa, aha.m kho ajja, yo aya.m, so assa, so eva, yato adhikara.na.m, anu addhamaasa.m, anu eti, su aagata.m, su aakaaro, du aakaaro, cakkhu aapaatha.m, bahu aabaadho, paatu akaasi, na tu evaatiidha --
[03] okaarukaaraana.m antabhuutaana.m sare pare kvaci ^b^va^eb^kaaraadeso hoti. ^b^ka kha ya ta^eb^saddaadi^b^o^eb^kaarasseda.m gaha.na.m.

[03] yaavatakvassa kaayo, taavatakvassa byaamo, kvattho, atha khvassa, aha.m khvajja, yvaaya.m, svassa, sveva, yatvaadhikara.na.m, anvaddhamaasa.m, anvebhi, svaagata.m, svaakaaro, dvaakaaro, cakkhvaapaatha.m, bahvaabaadho, paatvaakaasi, na tveva.
[03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? ko attho, atha kho a~n~nataraa, yoha.m, soha.m, cattaarome, saagata.m, saadhaavuso, hotuuti. ^b^anta^eb^ggaha.na.m ki.m? savaniiya.m, viravanti.
[03] pa.tisanthaaravutti ^a^M0.0014^ea^ assa, sabbaa vitti anubhuyyate, vi a~njana.m, vi aakato, nadii aasanno itiidha ma.n.duukagatiyaa ``asaruupe''ti vattate.
[03] pubbo iva.n.no asaruupe sare pare ^b^ya^eb^kaara.m pappoti navaa. i eva va.n.no ^b^iva.n.no, navaa^eb^saddo ^b^kvaci^eb^saddapariyaayo.
[03] pa.tisanthaaravutyassa, sabbaa vityaanubhuyyate, bya~njana.m, byaakato, nadyaasanno.
[03] ^b^navaa^eb^ti ki.m? pa~ncaha"ngehi, taani attani, gacchaamaha.m, muttacaagii anuddhato. ^b^asaruupe^eb^ti ki.m? itihida.m, aggiiva, atthiiti.
[03] ati anta.m, ati odaataa, pati ayo, pati aaharati, pati eti, iti assa, iti eta.m, itiaadi itiidha ``iva.n.no ya.m navaa''ti ^b^ya^eb^kaaraadese sampatte --

[03] sabbo ^b^ti^eb^icceso saddo sare pare kvaci ^b^ca^eb^kaara.m pappoti. ^b^tii^eb^ti niddesato akata^b^ya^eb^kaarassevaaya.m vidhi, itarathaa ^b^kvaci^eb^ggaha.nassa ca ``atissa cantassaa''tisuttassa ca niratthakataa siyaa. ``paradvebhaavo .thaane''ti dvitta.m.
[03] accanta.m ^a^M0.0015^ea^, accodaataa, paccayo, paccaaharati, pacceti, iccassa, icceta.m, iccaadi.
[03] ``te na vaaiva.n.ne''ti ito ``na iva.n.ne''ti ca vattate.

[03] ^b^ati^eb^iccetassa antabhuutassa ^b^ti^eb^saddassa iva.n.ne pare ``sabbo ca.m tii''ti vuttaruupa.m na hoti. ^b^atissaa^eb^ti ^b^ati^eb^upasaggaanukara.nameta.m. tenevettha vibhattilopaabhaavo. ettha ca ^b^anta^eb^saddo saddavidhinisedhappakara.nato ^b^ati^eb^saddantabhuuta.m ^b^ti^eb^saddameva vadati, na iva.n.nanti da.t.thabba.m, itarathaa ida.m suttameva niratthaka.m siyaa.
[03] ^b^ca^eb^kaaro anuttasamuccayattho, tena ^b^itipatii^eb^namantassa ca na hoti. ati isiga.no atiisiga.no, eva.m atiito, atiirita.m, itiiti, itiida.m, patiito.
[03] abhi akkhaana.m, abhi uggato, abhi okaaso itiidha ^b^ya^eb^kaare sampatte --
[03] ^b^adhi^eb^ agamaa, adhi upagato, adhi ogaahetvaa itiidha
[03] ^b^adhi^eb^iccetassa sabbassa sare pare ^b^ajjhaa^eb^deso hoti. ajjhagamaa, ajjhupagato, ajjhogaahetvaa.

[03] te ca kho ^b^abhiadhi^eb^iccete upasaggaa ^b^i^eb^va.n.ne pare abbho ajjhoiti vuttaruupaa na honti vaa. saralopaparanayanaani. abhicchita.m, adhiirita.m. ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m? abbhiirita.m, ajjhi.namutto, ajjhi.t.tho.
[03] ^b^dha^eb^iccetassa sare pare kvaci ^b^da^eb^kaaro hoti. ^b^eka^eb^saddato parassa ^b^idha^eb^ssa ^b^dha^eb^kaarassevaaya.m, saralopadiighaa. ekamidaaha.m. ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? idheva.

[03] ^b^yathaatathaa^eb^dvayaparasseda.m gaha.na.m. diighasaramhaa parassa ^b^eva^eb^saddaadibhuutassa ^b^e^eb^kaarassa ^b^ri^eb^kaaro hoti, pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navaa. yathariva, tathariva. ^b^navaa^eb^ti ki.m? yatheva, tatheva.
[03] ti anta.m,ti addha.m, aggi agaare, sattamii atthe, pa~ncamii anta.m, du a"ngika.m, bhikkhu aasane, puthu aasane, sayambhuu aasane itiidha ^b^yavaa^eb^desesu sampattesu --
[22] aakhyaate li"ngamajjhe ca, dvili"ngante ca dassanaa..
[03] ^b^jhala^eb^iccetesa.m ^b^iyauva^eb^iccete aadesaa honti vaa sare pare, saralopo.

[03] tiyanta.m, tiyaddha.m, aggiyaagaare, sattamiyatthe, pa~ncamiyanta.m, duva"ngika.m, bhikkhuvaasane, puthuvaasane, sayambhuvaasane. ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m? agyaagaare, sattamiiatthe, bhikkhuaasane nisiidati.
[03] ^b^go^eb^iccetassa ^b^o^eb^kaarassa sare pare ^b^avaa^eb^deso hoti samaase. gavaajina.m, gave.laka.m. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena uva.n.nassa ^b^uvaavaa^eb^desaa. yathaa -- bhuvi, pasavo.

[03] ^b^putha^eb^iccetassa nipaatassa ante kvaci ^b^ga^eb^kaaraagamo hoti sare pare. aagacchatiiti ^b^aagamo,^eb^ asantuppatti aagamo. ettha ca ``sare''ti nimittaasannavasena puthassa anteti labbhati. puthageva, putha eva.

[03] tathaa ^a^M0.0032^ea^ ^b^bo vassa^eb^ kuva diva siva vajaadiina.m dviruupassaati ^b^va^eb^kaaradvayassa ^b^ba^eb^kaaradvaya.m, yathaa -- kubbanto, eva.m kubbaano, kubbanti, sadhaatvantayaadesassa dvitta.m. divati dibbati, eva.m dibbanto, sibbati, sibbanto, pavajati pabbajati, pabbajanto, nivaana.m nibbaana.m, nibbuto, nibbindati, udabbaya.m iccaadi.
[03] ^b^lo rassa^eb^ pari taru.naadiina.m kvaci. paripanno palipanno, eva.m palibodho, palla"nka.m, taru.no taluno, mahaasaalo, maaluto, sukhumaalo.
[03] ^b^.to tassa^eb^ dukkataadiina.m kvaci. yathaa -- dukkata.m dukka.ta.m, eva.m suka.ta.m, paha.to, pattha.to, uddha.to, visa.to iccaadi.
[03] tathaa ^b^.no nassa pa pariaadito^eb^. panidhaana.m pa.nidhaana.m, eva.m pa.nipaato, pa.naamo, pa.niita.m, pari.nato, pari.naamo, ninnayo ni.n.nayo, eva.m u.n.nato, o.nato iccaadi.
[03] ^b^pati^eb^iccetassa upasaggassa sare vaa bya~njane vaa pare kvaci ^b^pa.ti^eb^aadeso hoti pubbassaralopo. pa.taggi, pa.tiha~n~nati.
[03] ^b^putha^eb^iccetassa anto saro ^b^u^eb^kaaro hoti bya~njane pare, dvitta.m. puthujjano, puthubhuuta.m.
[03] ^b^bya~njane^eb^ti ki.m? putha aya.m. ``puthassa a putha''iti samaaseneva siddhe puna ^b^anta^eb^ggaha.naadhikaarena kvaci aputhantassaapi utta.m sare.
[03] mano a~n~na.m manu~n~na.m, eva.m ima.m evuma.m, paralopo, iti eva.m itveva.m, ^b^u^eb^kaarassa ^b^va^eb^kaaro.
[03] ^b^ava^eb^iccetassa upasaggassa ^b^o^eb^kaaro hoti kvaci bya~njane pare. okaaso, onaddho, ovadati, osaana.m.
[03] ^b^ava^eb^saddassa upapade ti.t.thamaanassa tassokaarassa vipariito ca hoti bya~njane pare.

[03] tassa vipariito tabbipariito, upoccaarita.m pada.m upapada.m, ^b^okaaravipariito^eb^ti ukaarasseta.m adhivacana.m. ^b^ca^eb^saddo ^b^ka^eb^tthaci ^a^M0.0034^ea^ nivattanattho, dvitta.m. uggate suuriye, uggacchati, ^b^u^eb^ggahetvaa.
[03] bya~njane pare kvaci okaaraagamo hotiiti ^b^atippa para^eb^saddehi okaaraagamo ``yavamada''iccaadisutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^atippa^eb^to ^b^ga^eb^kaaraagamo ca.
[03] atippago kho taava, parosata.m, parosahassa.m, ettha ``saraa sare lopa''nti pubbassaralopo.
[03] manomaya.m, ayomaya.m, eva.m manose.t.thaa, ayopatto, tapodhano, tamonudo, siroruho, tejokasi.na.m, rajojalla.m, ahoratta.m, rahogato.
[03] siihagatiyaa ^b^vaa^eb^dhikaarato idha na bhavati, manamattena manaccha.t.thaana.m, ayakapalla.m, tamavinodano, manaaayatana.m.
[03] ta.nha.m karo, ra.na.m jaho, sa.m .thito, juti.m dharo, sa.m mato itiidha ``niggahiita''nti adhikaaro, ``bya~njane''ti vattate.

[03] vaggabhuute bya~njane pare niggahiita.m kho vagganta.m vaa pappotiiti nimittaanusvaraana.m .thaanaasannavasena tabbaggapa~ncamo hoti. vavatthitavibhaasatthoya.m ^b^vaa^eb^saddo. tena ``ta.nha"nkaro, ra.na~njaho, sa.n.thito, jutindharo, sammato''tiaadiisu nicca.m.

[03] ta"nkaroti ta.m karoti, ta"nkha.na.m ta.mkha.na.m, sa"ngaho sa.mgaho, ta"nghata.m ta.m ghata.m. dhamma~ncare dhamma.m care, ta~nchanna.m ta.m channa.m, ta~njaata.m ta.m jaata.m, ta~n~naa.na.m ta.m ~naa.na.m. ta.n.thaana.m ta.m .thaana.m, ta.n.dahati ^b^bha.m^eb^ .dahati. tantanoti ta.m tanoti, tanthira.m ta.m thira.m, tandaana.m ta.m daana.m, tandhana.m ta.m dhana.m, tanniccuta.m ta.m niccuta.m. tampatto ta.m patto, tamphala.m ta.m phala.m, tesambodho tesa.m bodho, sambhuuto sa.mbhuuto, tammitta.m ta.m mitta.m. ki"nkato ki.m kato, daatu"ngato daatu.m gatoti evamaadiisu vikappena.
[03] idha na bhavati, na ta.m kamma.m kata.m saadhu, sara.na.m gacchaami.

[03] sati copari ^b^vaa^eb^ggaha.ne vijjhantare vaa idha ^b^vaa^eb^ggaha.nakara.namatthantaravi~n~naapanattha.m, tena niggahiitassa ^b^sa.m^eb^upasaggapumantassa ^b^le la^eb^kaaro. yathaa -- pa.tisa.mliino pa.tisalliino, eva.m pa.tisallaa.no, sallakkha.naa, sallekho, sallaapo, pu.mli"nga.m pulli"nga.m.
[03] paccatta.m eva, ta.m eva, ta~nhi tassa, eva~nhi vo itiidha ``vaa''ti adhikaaro.
[03] ^b^e^eb^kaara^b^ha^eb^kaare pare niggahiita.m kho ^b^~na^eb^kaara.m pappoti vaa, ^b^e^eb^kaare ^b^~naa^eb^desassa dvibhaavo.
[03] paccatta~n~nevapaccatta.m eva, ta~n~neva ta.m eva, ta~nhi tassa ta~nhi tassa, eva~nhi vo eva~nhi vo.
[03] vavatthitavibhaasattaa ^b^vaa^eb^saddassa ^b^evahi^eb^nipaatato a~n~nattha na hoti, yathaa -- evameta.m, eva.m hoti.
[03] sa.myogo, sa.myojana.m, sa.myato, sa.myaacikaaya, ya.m yadeva, aanantarika.m yamaahu itiidha ``~na''miti vattate.
[03] niggahiita.m kho ^b^ya^eb^kaare pare saha ^b^ya^eb^kaarena ^b^~na^eb^kaara.m pappoti vaa, ^b^~naa^eb^desassa dvitta.m.
[03] sa~n~nogo sa.myogo, sa~n~nojana.m sa.myojana.m, sa~n~nato sa.myato, sa~n~naacikaaya sa.myaacikaaya, ya~n~nadeva ya.m yadeva, aanantarika~n~namaahu aanantarika.m yamaahu.
[03] ^b^vaa^eb^saddassa vavatthitavibhaasattaava ^b^sa.m^eb^padantato ca sabbanaama^b^ya^eb^kaaraparato ca niggahiitaa a~n~nattha na hoti. yathaa -- eta.m yojana.m, ta.m yaana.m, sara.na.m yanti.

[03] ettha ca ``saha ye caa''ti vattabbe ``sa ye caa''ti vacanato suttantesu sukhuccaara.natthamakkharalopopiiti da.t.thabba.m, tena pa.tisa"nkhaaya yoniso pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso, saya.m abhi~n~naaya sacchikatvaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa, pariyesanaaya pariyesanaatiaadi sijjhati.
[03] ta.m ^a^M0.0037^ea^ aha.m bruumi, ya.m aahu, dhana.m eva, ki.m eta.m, ninditu.m arahati, ya.m anicca.m, ta.m anattaa, eta.m avoca, eta.m eva iccatra --
[03] niggahiitassa kho sare pare ^b^ma^eb^kaara^b^da^eb^kaaraadesaa honti vaa. ettha ca ^b^vaa^eb^saddaadhikaarassa vavatthitavibhaasattaa ^b^da^eb^kaaro ^b^yateta^eb^saddato parasseva.
[03] tamaha.m bruumi, yamaahu, dhanameva, kimeta.m, ninditumarahati, yadanicca.m, tadanattaa, etadavoca, etadeva.
[03] ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m? ta.m aha.m, eta.m eva, akkocchi ma.m avadhi ma.m.
[03] ettha ca ^b^madaa^eb^ti yogavibhaagena bya~njanepi vaa ^b^ma^eb^kaaro. tena ``buddhama sara.nama gacchaamii''tiaadi sijjhati.
[03] taasa.m aha.m santike, viduuna.m agga.m, tassa adaasi.m aha.m itiidha ``sare''ti vattate.
[03] niggahiita.m kho sare pare lopa.m pappoti kvaci chandaanurakkha.ne sukhuccaara.na.t.thaane. pubbassaralopo, parassa asa.myogantassa diigho.
[03] taasaaha.m santike, viduunagga.m, tassa adaasaaha.m, tathaagataaha.m, evaaha.m, kyaaha.m.
[03] ariyasaccaana.m dassana.m, eta.m buddhaana.m saasana.m, sa.mratto, sa.mraago, sa.mrambho, avisa.mhaaro, cira.m pavaasi.m, gantu.m kaamo, gantu.m mano itiidha ``kvaci lopa''nti vattate.
[03] niggahiita.m kho bya~njane ca pare lopa.m pappoti kvaci chandaanurakkha.naadimhi. ^b^ra^eb^kaara^b^ha^eb^kaaresu upasaggantassa diigho.
[03] ariyasaccaana dassana.m, eta.m buddhaana saasana.m, saaratto, saaraago, saarambho, avisaahaaro, cirappavaasi.m, dvitta.m, gantukaamo, gantumano.

[03] kata.m iti, ki.m iti, abhinandu.m iti, uttatta.m iva, cakka.m iva, kali.m idaani, ki.m idaani, tva.m asi, ida.m api, uttari.m api, daatu.m api, sadisa.m eva itiidha ``niggahiitamhaa, lopa''nti ca vattate.
[03] niggahiitamhaa paro saro lopa.m pappoti vaa. niggahiitassa vaggantatta.m.
[03] katanti, kinti, abhinandunti, uttatta.mva, cakka.mva, kalindaani, kindaani, tva.msi, idampi, uttarimpi, daatumpi, sadisa.mva.
[03] ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m? kata.m iti, kimiti, daatumapi, saama.m eva.
[03] ayampi ^b^vaa^eb^saddassa vavatthitavibhaasattaa itiiviidaanisiipevaadito a~n~nattha na hoti. yathaa -- aha.m ettha, eta.m ahosi.
[03] eva.m assa te aasavaa, puppha.m assaa uppajjati itiidha sare pare lutte vipari.naamena ``parasmi.m, sare, lutte''ti ca vattate.
[03] niggahiitamhaa parasmi.m sare lutte bya~njano sa~n~nogo ce, visa~n~nogova hotiiti sa.myogekadesassa purimabya~njanassa lopo.
[03] dvinna.m bya~njanaanamekatra .thiti sa~n~nogo, idha pana sa.myujjatiiti sa~n~nogo, purimo va.n.no, vigato sa~n~nogo assaati ^b^visa~n~nogo,^eb^ paro.
[03] eva.m sa te aasavaa, puppha.msaa uppajjati.
[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddena ti.n.na.m bya~njanaana.m saruupasa.myogopi visa~n~nogo hoti. yathaa -- agyaagaara.m, vutyassa.
[03] cakkhu udapaadi, ava siro, yaavacidha bhikkhave, a.nuthuulaani, ta sampayuttaa ibhiidha ``sare, aagamo, kvaci, bya~njane''ti ca vattate.
[03] niggahiita~nca aagamo hoti sare vaa bya~njane vaa kvaci sukhuccaara.na.t.thaane. niggahiitassa rassaanugatattaa rassatoyevaaya.m.
[03] cakkhu.m udapaadi, ava.msiro, yaava~ncidha bhikkhave, a.nu.mthuulaani, ta.msampayuttaa, eva.m ta"nkha.ne, ta.msabhaavo.
[03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? na hi etehi, idha ceva.
[03] eva.m vutte, ta.m saadhu, eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa, aggi.mva sanama.m itiidha lopaadesakaariye sampatte yebhuyyena tadapavaadatthamaaha.
[03] niggahiita.m kho bya~njane pare a.miti hoti.
[03] eva.m vutte, ta.m saadhu, eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa, aggi.mva sandhama.m.
[03] ye idha amhehi visesato na upadi.t.thaa upasagganipaataadayo, tesa.m vuttayogato vuttanayena sarasandhaadiisu vuttanayaanusaarena ruupasiddhi veditabbaa.

[03] tena ``do dhassa caa''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena pariyaadiina.m rahanaadiva.n.nassa vipariyayo yavaadiihi, yathaa -- pariyudaahaasi payirudaahaasi, ariyassa ayirassa, bahvaabaadho bavhaabaadho, na abhineyya anabhineyya.
[03] ``ta.m iminaapi jaanaathaa''ti ettha ``paro vaa saro''ti sare lutte ``tatraakaaro''ti yogavibhaagena ^b^a^eb^kaaro niggahiitassa ^b^da^eb^kaaro, tadaminaapi jaanaatha iccaadi.
[03] atthaabhimukha.m namanato, attani catthassa naamanato ^b^naama.m,^eb^ dabbaabhidhaana.m.
[03] ta.m pana duvidha.m anvattharu.lhiivasena, tividha.m pumitthinapu.msakali"ngavasena. yathaa -- rukkho, maalaa, dhana.m.
[03] catubbidha.m saama~n~nagu.nakriyaayadicchaavasena, yathaa -- rukkho, niilo, paacako, siriva.d.dhotiaadi.
[03] tattha pa.thama.m ^b^a^eb^kaarantamhaa pulli"ngaa jaatinimittaa ^b^purisa^eb^saddaa ^b^syaa^eb^divibhattiyo paraa yojiiyante.

[03] ^b^adhikaaro^eb^ya.m. tattha pa~nca maare jitavaati jino, buddho. jinassa vacana.m jinavacana.m, tassa jinavacanassa yutta.m ^b^jinavacanayutta.m,^eb^ tepi.takassa buddhavacanassa maagadhikaaya sabhaavaniruttiyaa yutta.m anuruupamevaati ida.m adhikaarattha.m veditabba.m.
[03] ^b^adhikaaro^eb^ pana tividho siihagatikama.n.duukagatikayathaanupubbikavasena, aya.m pana siihagatiko pubbaaparavilokanato, yathaanupubbikoyeva vaa.

[03] ^b^li"nga.m^eb^paa.tipadika.m, yathaa yathaa jinavacanayutta~nhi li"nga.m, tathaa tathaa idha li"nga.m nipaccate .thapiiyati. ^b^ca^eb^saddena dhaatavo caati jinavacanaanuruupato ``purisa''iti li"nge .thapite tato tassa dhaatuppaccayavibhattivajjitassa atthavato saddassa ``parasama~n~naa payoge''ti paribhaasato li"ngasa~n~naaya.m --
[03] tato jinavacanayuttehi li"ngehi paraa vibhattiyo honti. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena tavetunaadipaccayantanipaatatopi. kammaadivasena, ekattaadivasena ca li"ngattha.m vibhajantiiti vibhattiyo.
[03] kaa ca pana taa vibhattiyo? ``vibhattiyo''ti adhikaaro.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ^b^siyo, a.myo, naahi, sana.m, smaahi, sana.m, smi.msu^eb^.

[03] syaadayo dvisatta vibhattiyo naama honti. tattha si, yo iti pa.thamaa, a.m, yo iti dutiyaa, naa, hi iti tatiyaa, sa, na.m iti catutthii, smaa, hi iti pa~ncamii, sa, na.m iti cha.t.thii, smi.m, su iti sattamii.

[03] ida.m ^a^M0.0043^ea^ pana sa~n~naadhikaaraparibhaasaavidhisuttesu ^b^sa~n~naasutta^eb^nti da.t.thabba.m, vutta~nhi vuttiya.m ``vibhattiiccanena kvattho, amhassa mama.m savibhattissa se''ti, itarathaa purimasuttena ekayogo kattabboti. ettha ca pa.thamaadivohaaro, ekavacanaadivohaaro ca anvatthavasena, parasama~n~naavasena vaa siddhoti veditabbo.
[03] ekassa vacana.m ekavacana.m, bahuuna.m vacana.m bahuvacana.m, dvinna.m puura.nii dutiyaatiaadi, itarathaa purimasutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena sa~n~naakara.ne appakataniratthakavidhippasa"ngo siyaa.
[03] ``jinavacanayutta~nhi, li"nga~nca nipaccate''ti ca vattate. idha pana padanipphaadanampi jinavacanassaavirodhenaati ~naapetu.m paribhaasantaramaaha.

[03] yathaa yathaa tesa.m jinavacanaana.m uparodho na hoti, tathaa tathaa idha li"nga.m, ^b^ca^eb^saddenaakhyaata~nca nipaccate, nipphaadiiyatiiti attho. teneva idha ca aakhyaate ca dvivacanaaggaha.na.m, sakkatavisadisato vibhattippaccayaadividhaana~nca katanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] li"ngatthaabhidhaanamatte pa.thamaavibhatti hotiiti pa.thamaa. tatthaapi aniyamenekavacanabahuvacanappasa"nge ``ekamhii vattabbe ekavacana''nti paribhaasato li"ngatthassekattavacanicchaaya.m pa.thamekavacana.m ^b^si^eb^.
[03] si, oiti dvipadamida.m. li"ngassa ^b^a^eb^kaarato parassa ^b^si^eb^vacanassa ^b^o^eb^kaaro hoti.
[03] suttesu hi pa.thamaaniddi.t.thassa kaariyino cha.t.thiivipari.naamena vivara.na.m aadesaapekkhanti da.t.thabba.m.

[03] ettha ca ^b^sii^eb^ti vibhatti gayhate vibhattikaariyavidhippakara.nato, ``tato ca vibhattiyo''ti ito ^b^vibhatti^eb^ggaha.naanuvattanato vaa, eva.m sabbattha ^b^syaa^eb^diina.m kaariyavidhaane vibhattiyevaati da.t.thabba.m.
[03] ``vaa paro asaruupaa''ti paralope sampatte tadapavaadena pubbalopamaaha.

[03] pubbassarassa lopo hoti ^b^a.m^eb^vacane, aadesappaccayaadibhuute ca sare pare, saralope kate tu parasarassa pakatibhaavo hoti. ettha ca ``saralope''ti punaggaha.na.m iminaava katasaralopanimitteyeva parassa vikaare sampatte pakatibhaavattha.m. parasarassa pakatibhaavavidhaanasaamatthiyato amaadesappaccayaadibhuute sare paretipi siddha.m.
[03] ^b^tu^eb^ggaha.na.m ^a^M0.0045^ea^ ^b^bhikkhunii^eb^aadiisu saralopanivattanattha.m, ``naye para.m yutte''ti para.m netabba.m. puriso ti.t.thati.
[03] puriso ca puriso caati purisa purisaiti vattabbe --

[03] saruupaana.m samaanaruupaana.m padabya~njanaana.m majjhe ekova sissate, a~n~ne lopamaapajjante asakinti ekaseso. ettha ca ``saruupaana''nti vuttattaava siddhe asakimpayoge pu^b^naasaki.m^eb^gaha.na.m ^b^e^eb^kavibhattivisayaanamevaasakimpayoge evaayanti dassanattha.m, na ca vicchaapayoge'tippasa"ngo. ``vaggaa pa~ncapa~ncaso mantaa''ti ettha ``pa~ncapa~ncaso''ti niddeseneva vicchaapayogasiddhiyaa ~naapitattaa, atha vaa sahavacanicchaaya'maya'mekaseso.
[03] tattheva li"ngatthassa ^b^ba^eb^huttavacanicchaaya.m ``bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana''nti pa.thamaabahuvacana.m ^b^yo,^eb^ purisa yo itiidha ``ato, vaa''ti ca vattate.

[03] ^b^a^eb^kaarantato li"ngamhaa paresa.m sabbesa.m pa.thamaayoniina.m, dutiyaayoniina~nca yayaakkama.m aakaarekaaraadesaa honti vaati ^b^aa^eb^kaaro, ^b^sabba^eb^ggaha.na.m sabbaadesattha.m, saralopaadi purimasadisameva, purisaa ti.t.thanti.
[03] vaa icceva ruupaa ruupaani, aggayo, munayo.
[03] ^b^a^eb^bhimukha.m katvaa lapana.m ^b^aalapana.m,^eb^ sambodhana.m. tasmi.m aalapanatthaadhike li"ngatthaabhidhaanamatte ca pa.thamaavibhatti hoti. pure viya ekavacanaadi.
[03] aalapanatthe vihito ^b^si ga^eb^sa~n~no hotiiti ^b^ga^eb^sa~n~naaya.m ``bho ge tuu''ti ito ``ge''ti vattate.
[03] li"ngassa sambandhii ^b^aa^eb^kaaro rassamaapajjate ^b^ge pare^eb^ vikappena, aduura.t.thassaalapanevaaya.m.

[03] ``si.m, so, syaa ca, sakhato gasse vaa, ghate caa''ti evamaadiihi niddi.t.thehi a~n~no seso naama, tato sesato li"ngamhaa ^b^gasi^eb^iccete lopamaapajjante. ^b^api^eb^ggaha.na.m ^a^M0.0047^ea^ dutiyatthasampi.n.danattha.m, ettha ca satipi ^b^si^eb^ggaha.ne ^b^va^eb^iti vacanameva ~naapakama~n~natthaapi ^b^si^eb^ggaha.ne aalapanaaggaha.nassa. keci aalapanaabhibyattiyaa ^b^bhavanta^eb^sadda.m vaa ^b^he^eb^sadda.m vaa payujjante. bho purisa ti.t.tha, he purisaa vaa.
[03] ya.m vaa karoti, ya.m vaa vikaroti, ya.m vaa paapu.naati, ta.m kaaraka.m kriyaanimitta.m kammasa~n~na.m hoti.
[03] kammatthe dutiyaavibhatti hoti. pure viya dutiyekavacana.m a.m, ``saralopo''tiaadinaa sare lutte ``diigha''nti diighe sampatte pakatibhaavo ca, purisa.m passa.
[03] yo attappadhaano kriya.m karoti, so kattusa~n~no hoti.
[03] kattari ca kaarake tatiyaavibhatti hotiiti tatiyekavacana.m ^b^naa^eb^.
[03] ^b^enaa^eb^ti avibhattikaniddeso. ^b^a^eb^kaarantato li"ngamhaa parassa ^b^naa^eb^vacanassa ^b^enaa^eb^deso hoti, saralopaadi, purisena kata.m.
[03] sabbato li"ngamhaa ^b^smaa hi smi.m^eb^iccetesa.m yathaakkama.m ^b^mhaa, bhi, mhi^eb^iccete aadesaa honti vaa, purisehi, purisebhi kata.m.

[03] ^b^bhaage^eb^ yadettha ma.m pati siyaa, ma.m pari, ma.m anu, ta.m diiyatu.
[03] ^b^vicchaayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0143^ea^ atthamattha.m pati saddo nivisati, rukkha.m rukkha.m pati vijjotate cando, rukkha.m rukkha.m pari, rukkha.m rukkha.m anu.

[03] ``abhirabhaage''ti abhissa bhaagavajjitesu lakkha.naadiisu kammappavacaniiyasa~n~naa vuttaa. ta.m kho pana bhavanta.m gotama.m eva.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggato, saadhu devadatto maatara.m abhi.

[03] cha.t.thiina.m atthe kvaci dutiyaavibhatti hoti. antaraaabhito parito pati pa.tibhaatiyoge aya.m. antaraa ca raajagaha.m antaraa ca naa.landa.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno, raajagahassa ca naa.landaaya ca majjheti attho. abhito gaama.m vasati, parito gaama.m vasati, nadi.m nera~njara.m pati, nera~njaraaya nadiyaa samiipeti attho. pa.tibhantu ta.m cunda bojjha"ngaa, upamaa ma.m pa.tibhaati, upamaa mayha.m upa.t.thahatiiti attho.
[03] tatiyaasattamiinamatthe ca kvaci li"ngamhaa dutiyaavibhatti hoti.
[03] ^b^tatiyatthe^eb^ sace ma.m naalapissati, tva~nca ma.m naabhibhaasasi, vinaa saddhamma.m kuto sukha.m, upaayamantarena na atthasiddhi.
[03] ^b^sattamiyatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0144^ea^-- kaale, upaanvajjhaavasassa payoge, adhisi.t.thaavasaana.m payoge, tappaanacaare ca dutiyaa.
[03] ^b^kaale^eb^ taava -- pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa, eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa. ima.m ratti.m cattaaro mahaaraajaano.

[03] ^b^upaa^eb^dipubbassa ^b^vasa^eb^dhaatussa payoge -- gaama.m upavasati, gaama.m anuvasati, vihaara.m adhivasati, gaama.m aavasati, agaara.m ajjhaavasati. tathaa pathavi.m adhisessati, gaama.m adhiti.t.thati, gaama.m ajjhaavasati.
[03] yena vaa kattaa upakara.nabhuutena vatthunaa kriya.m abyavadhaanena karoti, yena vaa vikaroti, yena vaa paapu.naati, ta.m kaaraka.m kara.nasa~n~na.m hoti.

[03] kariiyate anenaati ^b^kara.na.m,^eb^ ettha ca satipi sabbakaarakaana.m kriyaasaadhakatte ``yena vaa kayirate''ti visesetvaa vacana.m kattuupakara.nabhuutesu kaarakesu saadhakatamasseva gaha.nattha.m.
[22] sambhaaviiyati ta.m vutta.m, kara.na.m naama kaaraka''nti..
[03] yathaa -- hatthena kamma.m karoti, cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya. dattena viihayo lunaati, agginaa ku.ti.m jhaapeti.

[03] kattari ca kaarake li"ngamhaa tatiyaavibhatti hoti. caggaha.nena itthambhuutalakkha.ne, kriyaapavagge, pubbasadisasamuunattha kalaha nipu.na missaka sakhilatthaadiyoge, kaaladdhaanesu, paccattakammatthapa~ncamiyatthaadiisu ca tatiyaa.
[03] yo kriya.m attappadhaano hutvaa karoti, so kattusa~n~no hoti.

[03] so tividho suddhakattaa hetukattaa kammakattaati. tattha yo sayameva kriya.m karoti, so ^b^suddhakattaa^eb^. yo a~n~na.m kaatu.m samattha.m akaronta.m kamma.m niyojeti, so ^b^hetukattaa,^eb^ yathaa -- gantu.m samattho devadatto, tama~n~no payojeti ``gamayati devadatta''nti.

[03] ya.m pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto, tama~n~no payojayati ``gamayati devadatta''nti hetvatthanidassana.m, tampi saamatthiyadassanavasena ^a^M0.0146^ea^ vuttanti gahetabba.m. a~n~nathaa yadi sayameva gacchati, ki.m tattha payojakabyaapaarena akaronta.m balena kaarayati, paasaa.na.m u.t.thaapayatiitiaadika~nca na sijjheyya.
[03] yo kattaara.m kaareti, so hetusa~n~no hoti, kattaa caati hetukattusa~n~naa.
[03] yo pana parassa kriya.m pa.ticca kammabhuutopi sukarattaa sayameva sijjhanto viya hoti, so ^b^kammakattaa^eb^ naama, yathaa -- saya.m kariiyate ka.to, sayameva paccate odanoti.
[22] appayutto payutto vaa, sa kattaati pavuccati..

[03] nanu ca ``sa.myogo jaayate''tiaadiisu katha.m pure asato jananakriyaaya kattubhaavosiyaati? vuccate -- lokasa"nketasiddho hi saddappayogo, avijjamaanampi hi loko saddaabhidheyyataaya vijjamaana.m viya gahetvaa voharati ^a^M0.0147^ea^, vikappabuddhigahitaakaaroyeva hi saddenaabhidhiiyate, na tu vatthusabhaavo, a~n~nathaa sutamaya~naa.nenapi paccakkhena viya vatthusabhaavasacchikara.nappasa"ngo ca musaavaada kudi.t.thivaadaadiinamabhaavappasa"ngo ca siyaa, tasmaa buddhiparikappitapa~n~nattivasenapi saddappavatti hotiiti asato sa.myogaadissapi hoteva jananakriyaaya kattukaarakataati.
[21] buddhiyaa gahitattaa hi, sa.myogo jaayate iti.
[03] tatra ^b^tatiyaa^eb^ jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito maaro, ahinaa da.t.tho naro, buddhena bodhito loko, saddhehi kaarito vihaaro.
[03] abhihite na bhavati. ka.ta.m karoti devadatto, kaareti vaa.

[03] ^b^itthambhuutassa lakkha.ne^eb^ -- saa bhinnena siisena paggharantena lohitena pa.tivissakaana.m ujjhaapesi, uunapa~ncabandhanena pattena a~n~na.m nava.m patta.m cetaapeyya, tida.n.dakena paribbaajakamaddakkhi.
[03] ^b^apavagge^eb^ -- ekaaheneva baaraa.nasi.m paayaasi, navahi maasehi vihaara.m ni.t.thaapesi, yojanena adhiita.m byaakara.na.m, ^b^kriyaapavaggo^eb^ti kriyaaya aasu.m parini.t.thaapana.m.

[03] ^b^pubbaadiyoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0148^ea^-- maasena pubbo, pitaraa sadiso, maataraa samo, kahaapa.nena uuno, dhanena vikalo, asinaa kalaho, aacaarena nipu.no, vaacaaya nipu.no, gu.lena missaka.m, tilena missaka.m, vaacaaya sakhilo, ma.ninaa attho, dhanena attho, pitaraa tulyo.
[03] ^b^saha saddhi.m sama.m naanaa vinaa ala.m ki^eb^miccevamaadiihi yoge li"ngamhaa tatiyaavibhatti hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena sahatthepi.

[03] tattha ^b^saha^eb^saddena yogo kriyaa gu.na dabba samavaaye sambhavati. yathaa -- vitakkena saha vattati, puttena saha thuulo, antevaasikasaddhivihaarikehi saha aacariyupajjhaayaana.m laabho, nisiidi bhagavaa saddhi.m bhikkhusa"nghena, sahassena sama.m mitaa, sabbehi me piyehi manaapehi naanaabhaavo vinaabhaavo, sa"ngho vinaapi gaggena uposatha.m kareyya, ala.m te idha vaasena, ki.m me ekena ti.n.nena, purisena thaamadassinaa, ki.m te ja.taahi dummedha, ki.m te ajinasaa.tiyaa.
[03] ^b^sahatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0149^ea^-- devadatto raajagaha.m paavisi kokaalikena pacchaasama.nena, dukkho baalehi sa.mvaaso.
[03] ^b^yoga^eb^ggaha.namihaanuvattate, hetvatthe, hetvatthappayoge ca li"ngamhaa tatiyaavibhatti hoti.
[03] kismi~nci phale di.t.thasaamatthiya.m kaara.na.m hetu, soyeva attho, tasmi.m hetvatthe, annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjaaya vasati.
[21] kena paa.ni kaamadado, kena paa.ni madhussavo.
[22] kena te brahmacariyena, pu~n~na.m paa.nimhi ijjhati..
[03] ^b^hetvatthappayoge^eb^ -- kena nimittena, kena payojanena, kena.t.thena, kena hetunaa vasati.

[03] kaaladdhaanadisaadesaadiisu caaya.m. tena samayena, tena kaalena, kaalena dhammassava.na.m, so vo mamaccayena satthaa, maasena bhu~njati, yojanena dhaavati. puratthimena dhatara.t.tho, dakkhi.nena viruu.lhako, pacchimena viruupakkho, uttarena ^a^M0.0150^ea^ kasivanto janoghamaparena ca, yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami iccaadi.

[03] yena byaadhimataa a"ngena a"ngino vikaaro lakkhiiyate, tattha tatiyaavibhatti hoti. ettha ca a"ngamassa atthiiti ^b^a"nga.m,^eb^ sariira.m. akkhinaa kaa.no, hatthena ku.nii, paadena kha~njo, pi.t.thiyaa khujjo.

[03] visesiiyati visesitabba.m anenaati ^b^visesana.m,^eb^ gottaadi. tasmi.m gottanaamajaatisippavayogu.nasa"nkhaate visesanatthe tatiyaavibhatti hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^pakati^eb^aadiihi ca. gottena gotamo naatho.
[21] saariputtoti naamena, vissuto pa~n~navaa ca so.
[03] sippena na.lakaaro so, ekuunati.mso vayasaa, vijjaaya saadhu, pa~n~naaya saadhu, tapasaa uttamo, suva.n.nena abhiruupo.
[03] ^b^pakati^eb^aadiisu -- pakatiyaa abhiruupo, yebhuyyena mattikaa, samena dhaavati, visamena dhaavati, dvido.nena dha~n~na.m ki.naati, sahassena assake ki.naati iccaadi.
[03] 302^b^.^eb^ ^b^yassa daatukaamo rocate dhaarayate vaa ta.m sampadaana.m^eb^.
[03] yassa vaa daatukaamo, yassa vaa rocate, yassa vaa dhaarayate, ta.m kaaraka.m sampadaanasa~n~na.m hoti. sammaa padiiyate assaati ^b^sampadaana.m,^eb^ pa.tiggaahako.

[03] ta.m pana tividha.m diyyamaanassaanivaara.najjhesanaanumativasena. yathaa -- buddhassa puppha.m yajati, bodhirukkhassa jala.m dadaati. ^b^ajjhesane^eb^ -- yaacakaana.m dhana.m dadaati. ^b^anumatiya.m^eb^ -- bhikkhuuna.m daana.m deti.
[22] sampadaana.m tidhaa vutta.m, rukkha yaacaka bhikkhavo''ti..
[03] ^b^rocanaa^eb^diisu pana -- sama.nassa rocate sacca.m, maayasmantaanampi sa"nghabhedo ruccittha, yassaayasmato khamati, devadattassa suva.n.nacchatta.m dhaarayate ya~n~nadatto.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ ^b^silaagha hanu .thaa sapa dhaara piha kudha duhi ssaasuuya raadhikkha paccaasu.na anupatigi.napubbakattaarocanatthatadattha tumatthaalamattha ma~n~naanaadarappaa.nini gatyatthakammani aasisattha sammuti bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca^eb^.

[03] catuppadamida.m ^a^M0.0152^ea^. ^b^silaagha^eb^ katthane, ^b^hanu^eb^ apanayane, ^b^.thaa^eb^ gatinivattimhi, ^b^sapa^eb^ akkose, ^b^dhara^eb^ dhaara.ne, ^b^piha^eb^ icchaaya.m iccetesa.m dhaatuuna.m payoge, ^b^kudha^eb^ kope, ^b^duha^eb^ jigha.msaaya.m, ^b^issa^eb^ issaaya.m, ^b^usuuya^eb^ dosaavikara.ne iccetesa.m tadatthavaaciina~nca dhaatuuna.m payoge ca ^b^raadha^eb^ hi.msaasa.mraadhesu, ^b^ikkha^eb^ dassana"nkesuuti imesa.m payoge ca ^b^pati aa^eb^pubbassa ^b^su^eb^ sava.neti imassa ca ^b^anupati^eb^pubbassa ^b^ge^eb^saddeti imassa ca pubbakattaa ca aarocanatthappayoge, tadatthe, tumatthe, alamatthappayoge ca ma~n~natippayoge anaadare appaa.nini ca gatyatthaana.m kammani ca aasisatthappayoge ca sammuti bhiyyappayogesu ca sattamyatthe caati ta.m kammaadikaaraka.m sampadaanasa~n~na.m hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena pahi.natikappati pahoti upamaa~njalikara.na phaasu atthaseyyappabhutiyoge ca pure viya catutthii.
[03] ^b^silaaghaadippayoge^eb^ taava -- buddhassa silaaghate. upajjhaayassa silaaghate, thometiiti attho.
[03] hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatiiti attho.
[03] upati.t.theyya sakyaputtaana.m va.d.dhakii, ettha ca upa.t.thaana.m naama upagamana.m. bhikkhussa bhu~njamaanassa paaniiyena vaa vidhuupanena vaa upati.t.theyya.
[03] tuyha.m sapate, mayha.m sapate, ettha ca ^b^sapana.m^eb^ naama saccakara.na.m.
[03] ^b^dhaarayatippayoge^eb^ dhanikoyeva sampadaana.m, suva.n.na.m te dhaarayate, i.na.m dhaarayatiiti attho. tassa ra~n~no maya.m naaga.m dhaarayaama.
[03] ^b^pihappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0153^ea^ icchitoyeva, devaapi tassa pihayanti taadino, devaapi tesa.m pihayanti, sambuddhaana.m satiimata.m, patthentiiti attho.
[03] ^b^kodhaadiatthaana.m payoge^eb^ ya.m pati kopo, tassa kujjha mahaaviira, yadiha.m tassa kuppeyya.m.
[03] duhayati disaana.m megho, yo mittaana.m na dubbhati.
[03] dujjanaa gu.navantaana.m usuuyanti, kaa usuuyaa vijaanata.m.

[03] ^b^raadhikkhappayoge^eb^ yassa vipucchana.m kammavikhyaapanattha.m, ^b^vaa^eb^dhikaarato dutiyaa ca. aaraadho me ra~n~no, ra~n~no aparajjhati, raajaana.m vaa aparajjhati, kyaaha.m ayyaana.m aparajjhaami, kyaaha.m ayye aparajjhaami vaa.
[03] aayasmato upaalittherassa upasampadaapekkho upatisso, aayasmanta.m vaa.

[03] ^b^paccaasu.na anupatigi.naana.m pubbakattaa ca^eb^ su.notissa dhaatussa paccaayoge, gi.nassa ca anupatiyoge pubbassa kammuno yo kattaa, so sampadaanasa~n~no hoti. yathaa -- bhagavaa bhikkhuu etadavoca, ettha ``bhikkhuu''ti akathitakamma.m, ``eta''nti kathitakamma.m, pubbassa vacanakammassa kattaa bhagavaa. bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m, aasu.nanti buddhassa bhikkhuu, tathaa bhikkhu jana.m dhamma.m saaveti, tassa bhikkhuno jano anugi.naati, tassa bhikkhuno jano patigi.naati, saadhukaaradaanaadinaa ta.m ussaahayatiiti attho.
[21] yo vadeti sa kattaati, vutta.m kammanti vuccati.

[03] ^b^aarocanatthappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0154^ea^ yassa aaroceti, ta.m sampadaana.m. aarocayaami vo bhikkhave, pa.tivedayaami vo bhikkhave, aamantayaami te mahaaraaja, aamanta kho ta.m gacchaamaati vaa. ettha ca ^b^aarocana^eb^saddassa kathanappakaaratthattaa desanatthaadippayogepi catutthii. dhamma.m vo desessaami, desetu bhante bhagavaa dhamma.m bhikkhuuna.m, yathaa no bhagavaa byaakareyya, nirutti.m te pavakkhaami iccaadi.
[03] ^b^a^eb^kaarantato li"ngamhaa parassa catutthekavacanassa ^b^aayaa^eb^deso hoti vaa, saralopaadi.

[03] buddhassatthaaya dhammassatthaaya sa"nghassatthaaya jiivita.m pariccajaami, pi.n.dapaata.m pa.tisevaami neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, uunassa paaripuuriyaa, atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ^b^ala.m^eb^saddassa atthaa arahapa.tikkhepaa. ^b^arahatthe^eb^ -- ala.m me rajja.m, ala.m bhikkhu pattassa, akkhadhutto purisapuggalo naala.m daarabhara.naaya, ala.m mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa.
[03] ^b^pa.tikkhepe^eb^ ^a^M0.0155^ea^-- ala.m te idha vaasena, ala.m me hira~n~nasuva.n.nena, ki.m me ekena ti.n.nena, ki.m te ja.taahi dummedha, ki.m tettha catuma.t.thassa.
[03] ^b^ma~n~natippayoge anaadare appaa.nini^eb^ kammaniyeva -- ka.t.thassa tuva.m ma~n~ne, ka.li"ngarassa tuva.m ma~n~ne, jiivita.m ti.naayapi na ma~n~namaano.
[03] ^b^anaadare^eb^ti ki.m? suva.n.na.m ta.m ma~n~ne. ^b^appaa.ninii^eb^ti ki.m? gadrabha.m tuva.m ma~n~ne.
[03] ^b^gatyatthakammani vaa^eb^dhikaarato dutiyaa ca. appo saggaaya gacchati, appo sagga.m gacchati, nibbaanaaya vajantiyaa, muulaaya pa.tikasseyya, muula.m pa.tikasseyya.

[03] ^b^aasiisanatthe aayubhaddakusalaa^eb^diyogeyeva, aayasmato diighaayu hotu, ``totitaa sasmi.mnaasuu''ti ^b^ntu^eb^ssa savibhattissa ^b^to^eb^ aadeso. bhadda.m bhavato hotu, kusala.m bhavato hotu, anaamaya.m bhavato hotu, sukha.m bhavato hotu, attha.m bhavato hotu, hita.m bhavato hotu, svaagata.m bhavato hotu, sotthi hotu sabbasattaana.m.
[03] ^b^sammutippayoge^eb^ -- saadhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanaaya.
[03] ^b^sattamiyatthe aavikara.na paatubhavanaa^eb^diyoge -- tuyha~ncassa aavikaromi, tassa me sakko paaturahosi.

[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena ^a^M0.0156^ea^ pahi.naadikriyaayoge, phaasuaadinaamapayoge ca -- tassa pahi.neyya, bhikkhuuna.m duuta.m paahesi, kappati sama.naana.m aayogo, ekassa dinna.m dvinna.m ti.n.na.m pahoti, upama.m te karissaami, a~njali.m te pagga.nhaami. tathaa tassa phaasu hoti, lokassattho, ma.ninaa me attho, seyyo me attho iccaadi.

[03] ^b^namo^eb^saddayoge, ^b^sotthisvaagataadii^eb^hi ca yoge li"ngamhaa catutthiivibhatti hoti. namo te buddha viiratthu, namo karohi naagassa, namatthu buddhaana.m, namatthu bodhiyaa, sotthi pajaana.m, svaagata.m te mahaaraaja, atho te aduraagata.m.
[03] bhaavavaacimhi catutthiivibhatti hoti bhavissatikaale. bhavana.m ^b^bhaavo^eb^. paccissate, pacana.m vaa paako, paakaaya vajati, pacitu.m gacchatiiti attho. eva.m bhogaaya vajati iccaadi.

[03] yasmaa vaa avadhito apeti, yasmaa vaa bhayahetuto bhaya.m bhavati, yasmaa vaa akkhaataaraa vijja.m aadadaati, ta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti. apanetvaa ito aadadaatiiti ^b^apaadaana.m^eb^.
[03] ta.m pana tividha.m visayabhedena niddi.t.thavisaya.m, upaattavisaya.m, anumeyyavisaya~ncaati.
[03] apaadaanasa~n~naavisayassa kriyaavisesassa niddi.t.thattaa ^b^niddi.t.thavisaya.m^eb^. yathaa -- gaamaa apenti munayo, nagaraa niggato raajaa.

[03] ettha ca ``paapaa citta.m nivaaraye, paapaa nivaarentii''tiaadiisu yadipi kaayasa.myogapubbakaapagamana.m natthi, tathaapi cittasa.myogapubbakassa apagamanassa sambhavato iminaa ca apaadaanasa~n~naa.

[03] yattha pana apagamanakriya.m upaatta.m ajjhaaha.ta.m visaya.m katvaa pavattati, ta.m ^b^upaattavisaya.m^eb^. yathaa -- valaahakaa vijjotate vijju, kusuulato pacatiiti. ettha ca ``valaahakaa nikkhamma, kusuulato apanetvaa''ti ca pubbakriyaa ajjhaahariiyati.

[03] ^b^anumeyyavisaya.m^eb^ yathaa -- maathuraa paa.taliputtakehi abhiruupaa. ettha hi kenaci gu.nena ukka.msiiyantiiti anumeyyova kriyaaviseso. idha pana ^b^duurantikaa^eb^disutte ^b^vibhatta^eb^ggaha.nena apaadaanasa~n~naa.
[03] ^b^bhayahetumhi^eb^ -- coraa bhaya.m jaayati, ta.nhaaya jaayatii bhaya.m, paapato uttasati, ^b^akkhaatari^eb^ -- upajjhaayaa sikkha.m ga.nhaati, aacariyamhaa adhiite, aacariyato su.naati.

[03] dhaatavo ca naamaani ca ^b^dhaatunaamaani,^eb^ tesa.m avihitalakkha.naana.m dhaatunaamaana.m payoge, upasaggayoge ca ^b^aadi^eb^saddena nipaatayoge ca ta.myutta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti.

[03] ^b^dhaatuppayoge^eb^ taava -- ^b^paraaji^eb^yoge yo asayho, pabhuuyoge pabhavo, janiyoge jaayamaanassa pakati ca. yathaa -- buddhasmaa paraajenti a~n~natitthiyaa. himavataa pabhavanti pa~nca mahaanadiyo, anavatattamhaa mahaasaraa pabhavanti, aciravatiyaa pabhavanti kunnadiyo. kaamato jaayatii soko, yasmaa so jaayate gini, urasmaa jaato putto, kammato jaata.m indriya.m.
[03] ^b^naamappayoge a~n~natthitaraa^eb^diihi yutte -- naa~n~natra dukkhaa sambhoti, naa~n~na.m dukkhaa nirujjhati, tato a~n~nena kammena, tato itara.m, ubhato sujaato putto iccaadi.

[03] ^b^upasaggayuttesu^eb^ ^a^M0.0159^ea^ ^b^apaparii^eb^hi vajjanatthehi yoge, mariyaadaabhividhiatthe aayoge ^b^pati^eb^naa patinidhipatidaanatthena yoge ca. yathaa -- apasaalaaya aayanti vaa.nijaa, saala.m vajjetvaati attho. tathaa paripabbataa devo vassati, pabbata.m vajjetvaati attho. ^b^mariyaadaaya.m^eb^ -- aapabbataa khetta.m. ^b^abhividhimhi^eb^ -- aabrahmalokaa saddo abbhuggacchati, brahmaloka.m abhibyaapetvaati attho. ^b^patinidhimhi^eb^ -- buddhasmaa pati saariputto dhammadesanaaya aalapati temaasa.m. ^b^patidaane^eb^ -- ghatamassa telasmaa pati dadaati, kanakamassa hira~n~nasmaa pati dadaati.

[03] ^b^nipaatayuttesu rite naanaa vinaa^eb^diihi yoge -- rite saddhammaa kuto sukha.m labhati. te bhikkhuu naanaakulaa pabbajitaa. vinaa saddhammaa nattha~n~no koci naatho loke vijjati. ariyehi puthagevaaya.m jano, yaava brahmalokaa saddo abbhuggacchati.

[03] ^b^api^eb^ggaha.nena kammaapaadaanakaarakamajjhepi pa~ncamii kaaladdhaanehi, pakkhasmaa vijjhati miga.m luddako, ito pakkhasmaa miga.m vijjhatiiti vutta.m hoti. eva.m maasasmaa bhu~njati bhojana.m, kosaa vijjhati ku~njara.m.

[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddaggaha.nena ^b^pabhutyaa^eb^diatthe, tadatthappayoge ca -- yatoha.m bhagini ariyaaya jaatiyaa jaato, yato saraami attaana.m, yato pattosmi vi~n~nuta.m, yatvaadhikara.namena.m, yato pabhuti, yato pa.t.thaaya, tato pa.t.thaaya iccaadi.

[03] rakkha.natthaana.m dhaatuuna.m payoge ya.m icchita.m, ta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti, ^b^ca^eb^kaaraadhikaarato anicchita~nca. rakkha.na~ncettha nivaara.na.m, taayana~nca. kaake rakkhanti ta.n.dulaa, yavaa pa.tisedhenti gaavo.

[03] ^b^anicchita.m^eb^ yathaa -- paapaa citta.m ^b^ni^eb^vaaraye, paapaanivaarenti, raajato vaa corato vaa aggito vaa udakato vaa naanaabhayato vaa naanaarogato vaa naanaaupaddavato vaa aarakkha.m ga.nhantu.

[03] yena adassanamicchita.m antaradhaayantena, ta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti vaa, antaradhaanevaaya.m. upajjhaayaa antaradhaayati sisso, niliiyatiiti attho. maataapituuhi antaradhaayati putto.
[03] ^b^vaa^eb^ti ki.m? jetavane antarahito. ^b^yenaa^eb^ti ki.m? yakkho tattheva antaradhaayati.
[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ^b^duurantikaddhakaalanimmaanatvaalopadisaayogavibhattaarappayoga suddhappamocana hetu vivittappamaa.na pubbayoga bandhana gu.navacana pa~nha kathanathokaakattuusu ca^eb^.

[03] duuratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmaane, kaalanimmaane, tvaalope, disaayoge, vibhatte, aaratippayoge, suddhatthappayoge, pamocanatthappayoge, hetvatthe, vivittatthappayoge, pamaa.natthe, pubbayoge, bandhanatthappayoge, gu.navacane ^a^M0.0161^ea^, pa~nhe, kathane, thokatthe, akattari ca yadavadhibhuuta.m, hetukammaadibhuuta~nca, ta.m kaaraka.m apaadaanasa~n~na.m hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena yathaayoga.m dutiyaa, tatiyaa, cha.t.thii ca.
[03] ^b^e^eb^ttha ca duurantika~nca duurantikattha~ncaati ^b^duurantika^eb^nti saruupekasesa.m katvaa vuttanti da.t.thabba.m, tena duurantikatthappayoge, tadatthe ca apaadaanasa~n~no hoti.

[03] ^b^duuratthappayoge^eb^ taava -- kiivaduuro ito na.lakaaragaamo, tato have duuratara.m vadanti, gaamato naatiduure. aarakaa te moghapurisaa imasmaa dhammavinayaa, aarakaa tehi bhagavaa. ^b^duuratthe^eb^ -- duuratova namassanti, addasa duuratova aagacchanta.m.
[03] ^b^antikatthappayoge^eb^ -- antika.m gaamaa, aasanna.m gaamaa, samiipa.m gaamaa, gaamassa samiipanti attho.

[03] dutiyaa, tatiyaa ca, duura.m gaama.m aagato, duurena gaamena aagato, duurato gaamaa aagatoti attho. duura.m gaamena vaa. antika.m gaama.m aagato, antika.m gaamena vaa, aasanna.m gaama.m, aasanna.m gaamena vaa iccaadi.
[03] ^b^addhakaalanimmaane^eb^ nimmaana.m naama parimaa.na.m, tasmi.m gamyamaane -- ito mathuraaya catuusu yojanesu sa"nkassa.m, raajagahato pa~ncacattaaliisayojanamatthake saavatthi.
[03] ^b^kaalanimmaane^eb^ -- ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassii bhagavaa loke udapaadi, ito vassasahassaccayena buddho loke uppajjissati.

[03] ^b^tvaapaccayantassa lopo^eb^ naama tadatthasambhavepi avijjamaanataa, tasmi.m tvaalope kammaadhikara.nesu -- paasaadaa sa"nkameyya, paasaada.m abhiruhitvaa sa"nkameyyaati attho ^a^M0.0162^ea^. tathaa hatthikkhandhaa sa"nkameyya, abhidhammaa pucchanti, abhidhamma.m sutvaa vaa, abhidhammaa kathayanti, abhidhamma.m pa.thitvaa vaa, aasanaa vu.t.thaheyya, aasane nisiiditvaa vaa.

[03] ^b^disatthavaaciihi yoge, disatthe^eb^ ca -- ito saa purimaa disaa, ito saa dakkhi.naa disaa, ito saa pacchimaa disaa, ito saa uttaraa disaa, aviicito uparibhavaggaa, uddha.m paadatalaa, adho kesamatthakaa iccaadi. ^b^disatthe^eb^ -- puratthimato dakkhi.natotiaadi. ettha pana sattamiyatthe ^b^to^eb^paccayopi bhavissati.

[03] ^b^vibhatta.m^eb^ naama saya.m vibhattasseva tada~n~nato gu.nena vibhajana.m, tasmi.m vibhatte -- yato pa.niitataro vaa visi.t.thataro vaa natthi, attadanto tato vara.m. ki~ncaapi daanato siilameva vara.m, tato mayaa sutaa assutameva bahutara.m, siilameva sutaa seyyo. cha.t.thii ca, channavutiina.m paasa.n.daana.m pavara.m yadida.m sugatavinayo.
[03] ^b^aaratippayogo^eb^ naama virama.natthasaddappayogo. tattha -- asaddhammaa aarati, virati paapaa, paa.naatipaataa verama.nii, adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato, appa.tivirato musaavaadaa.
[03] ^b^suddhatthappayoge^eb^ -- lobhaniiyehi dhammehi suddho asa.msa.t.tho, maatito ca pitito ca suddho anupakku.t.tho agarahito.
[03] ^b^pamocanatthappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0163^ea^-- parimutto dukkhasmaati vadaami, mutto maarabandhanaa, na te muccanti maccunaa, muttoha.m sabbapaasehi.

[03] ^b^hetvatthe,^eb^ saruupekasesassa gahitattaa hetvatthappayoge ca sabbanaamato -- kasmaa nu tumha.m daharaa na miiyare, kasmaa idheva mara.na.m bhavissati, kasmaa hetunaa, yasmaa ca kammaani karonti, yasmaa tiha bhikkhave, tasmaa tiha bhikkhave eva.m sikkhitabba.m, tasmaa buddhosmi braahma.na, yasmaa kaara.naa, tasmaa kaara.naa, ki.m kaara.naa. dutiyaa, cha.t.thii ca, ki.m kaara.na.m, ta.m kissa hetu, kissa tumhe kilamatha.
[03] kena hetunaa, kena kaara.nena, yena midhekacce sattaa, tena nimittena, tena vuttamiccaadiisu ``hetvatthe caa''ti tatiyaa.
[03] ^b^vivitta.m^eb^ naama vivecana.m, tadatthappayoge -- vivitto paapakaa dhammaa, vivicceva kaamehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi.
[03] ^b^pamaa.natthe^eb^ tatiyaa ca, aayaamato ca vitthaarato ca yojana.m, gambhiirato ca puthulato ca yojana.m candabhaagaaya parimaa.na.m, parikkhepato navayojanasataparimaa.no majjhimapadeso.
[03] diighaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyaa pamaa.nikaa kaaretabbaa.
[03] ettha ca ``smaahismi.mna''miccaadito ``smaa''ti ca ``so, vaa''ti ca vattamaane
[03] diighaso, diighamhaa vaa, [oraso, oramhaa vaa] tatiyaa ca, yojana.m aayaamena, yojana.m vitthaarena, yojana.m ubbedhena saasaparaasi.

[03] pa.thamatthavaacakena ^b^pubba^eb^saddena yogo ^b^pubbayogo,^eb^ ettha ca ^b^pubba^eb^ggaha.na.m adisatthavuttino ^b^pubbaa^eb^diggaha.nassupalakkha.nanti da.t.thabba.m, tena ^b^paraa^eb^diyogepi. yathaa -- pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhaa, ito pubbenaahosi, tato para.m paccantimaa janapadaa, dhaatuli"ngehi paraa paccayaa, tato aparena samayena, tato uttarimpi iccaadi.
[03] ^b^bandhanatthappayoge^eb^ bandhanahetumhi i.ne pa~ncamii, tatiyaa ca hoti, satasmaa baddho naro ra~n~naa, satena vaa baddho naro.

[03] phalasaadhanahetubhuutassa gu.nassa vacana.m ^b^gu.navacana.m,^eb^ tasmi.m gu.navacane pa~ncamii, tatiyaa ca, issariyaa jana.m rakkhati raajaa, issariyena vaa, siilato na.m pasa.msanti, siilena vaa, pa~n~naaya vimuttimano iccaadi.
[03] ^b^pa~nhakathanesu^eb^ -- kutosi tva.m, kuto bhava.m, paa.taliputtato. ettha ca ^b^kathana.m^eb^ naama vissajjana.m.
[03] ^b^thokatthe asatvavacane^eb^ kara.ne tatiyaa ca, thokaa muccati, thokena muccati vaa, appamattakaa muccati, appamattakena vaa, kicchaa muccati, kicchena vaa.

[03] ^b^akattari^eb^ ^a^M0.0165^ea^ ^b^akaarake ~naapakahetumhi^eb^ -- kammassa katattaa upacitattaa ussannattaa vipulattaa uppanna.m hoti cakkhuvi~n~naa.na, ^b^na^eb^ taavida.m naamaruupa.m ahetuka.m sabbattha sabbadaa sabbesa~nca ekasadisabhaavaapattito.

[03] karoti attano phalanti ^b^kaara.na.m,^eb^ kaarakahetu [janakahetu], tasmi.m kaara.natthe ca pa~ncamiivibhatti hoti, vikappenaaya.m, hetvatthe tatiyaaya ca vihitattaa, ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa catunna.m ariyasaccaana.m yathaabhuuta.m adassanaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m, avijjaapaccayaa sa"nkhaaraa, sa"nkhaarapaccayaa vi~n~naa.na.m, avijjaaya tveva asesaviraaganirodhaa sa"nkhaaranirodho, sa"nkhaaranirodhaa vi~n~naa.nanirodho, vi~n~naa.nanirodhaa iccaadi.
[03] pariggayhatiiti ^b^pariggaho,^eb^ yo yassa pariggaho aayatto sambandhii, ta.m pati so attho saamisa~n~no hoti. ^b^vaa^eb^ggaha.nena saamitabba rujaadiyogepi.

[03] ettha ^a^M0.0166^ea^ ca kriyaabhisambandhaabhaavaa na kaarakataa sambhavati. saamibhaavo hi kriyaakaarakabhaavassa phalabhaavena gahito, tathaa hi ``ra~n~no puriso''ti vutte yasmaa raajaa dadaati, puriso ca patigga.nhaati, tasmaa ``raajapuriso''ti vi~n~naayati. eva.m yo yassa aayatto sevakaadibhaavena vaa bha.n.dabhaavena vaa samiipa samuuhaavayavavikaara kaariyaavatthaa jaati gu.na kriyaadivasena vaa, tassa sabbassaapi so sambandhaadhaarabhuuto visesana.t.thaanii aagamiivasena tividhopi attho ^b^saamii^eb^ naamaati gahetabbo.

[03] ^b^visesanato^eb^ taava -- ra~n~no purisoti, ettha ca raajaa purisa.m a~n~nasaamito viseseti nivattetiiti ^b^visesana.m,^eb^ puriso tena visesiiyatiiti ^b^visesitabbo,^eb^ eva.m sabbattha visesitabbayoge visesanatova cha.t.thii.
[03] ^b^bha.n.dena sambandhe^eb^ -- pahuuta.m me dhana.m sakka, etassa pa.tiviiso, bhikkhussa pattaciivara.m.
[03] ^b^kaariyasambandhe^eb^ -- yavassa a"nkuro, meghassa saddo, puttaapi tassa bahavo, kammaana.m phala.m vipaako.
[03] ^b^avatthaasambandhe^eb^ -- khandhaana.m paatubhaavo, khandhaana.m jaraa, khandhaana.m bhedo.

[03] ^b^gu.nasambandhe^eb^ -- suva.n.nassa va.n.no, va.n.no na khiiyetha tathaagatassa, buddhassa gu.naghoso, pupphaana.m gandho, phalaana.m raso, cittassa phusanaa, sippikaana.m sata.m natthi, tilaana.m mu.t.thi, tesa.m samaayogo, sandhino vimokkho, tathaagatassa pa~n~naapaarami.m aarabbha, pubbacariya.m vaa, sukha.m te, dukkha.m te, cetaso parivitakko udapaadi, pa~n~naaya pa.tubhaavo, ruupassa lahutaa, ruupassa mudutaa, ruupassa upacayo.

[03] ^b^kriyaasambandhe^eb^ -- paadassa ukkhipana.m, paadassa avakkhepana.m vaa, hatthassa sami~njana.m, paadaana.m pasaara.na.m, dhaatuuna.m gamana.m, dhaatuuna.myeva .thaana.m, nisajjaa, sayana.m vaa. tathaa tassa naamagottaadi, tassa kaara.na.m, tassa maataapitaro, tassa purato paaturahosi, tassa pacchato, nagarassa dakkhi.nato, vassaana.m tatiye maase, na tassa upamaa, kuverassa bali iccaadi.

[03] ^b^tabba rujaadiyoge^eb^ -- mahaasenaapatiina.m ujjhaapetabba.m vikanditabba.m viravitabba.m, devadattassa rujati, tassa rogo uppajjati, rajakassa vattha.m dadaati, musaavaadassa ottappa.m iccaadi.
[03] ^b^yajassa kara.ne^eb^ -- pupphassa buddha.m yajati, pupphena vaa, ghatassa aggi.m juhoti.
[03] ^b^suhitatthayoge^eb^ -- patta.m odanassa puuretvaa, odanenaati attho. imameva kaaya.m puura.m naanappakaarassa asucino paccavekkhati, puura.m hira~n~nasuva.n.nassa, puurati baalo paapassa.
[03] ^b^tulyatthakimalamaadiyoge^eb^ -- pitussa tulyo, pitaraa vaa tulyo, maatu sadiso, maataraa sadiso vaa, ki.m tassa ca tu.t.thassa, ki.m tena tu.t.thenaati attho. ala.m tassa ca tu.t.thassa.

[03] ^b^kattari kitappaccayayoge^eb^ -- sobhanaa kaccaayanassa kati, kaccaayanena vaa, ra~n~no sammato, ra~n~naa vaa, eva.m ra~n~no ^a^M0.0169^ea^ puujito, ra~n~no sakkato, ra~n~no apacito, ra~n~no maanito, amata.m tesa.m bhikkhave aparibhutta.m, yesa.m kaayagataasati aparibhuttaa iccaadi.

[03] ^b^sattamiyatthe kusalaadiyoge^eb^ -- kusalaa naccagiitassa sikkhitaa caaturitthiyo, kusalo tva.m rathassa a"ngapacca"ngaana.m, kusalo maggassa, kusalo amaggassa, santi hi bhante u.laaraa yakkhaa bhagavato pasannaa, divasassa tikkhattu.m, divase tikkhattu.m vaa, maasassa dvikkhattu.m iccaadi.

[03] ^b^dutiyatthe kammani kitakayoge^eb^ -- tassa bhavanti vattaaro, sahasaa kammassa kattaaro, amatassa daataa, bhinnaana.m sandhaataa, sahitaana.m anuppadaataa, bodhetaa pajaaya, kammassa kaarako natthi, vipaakassa ca vedako, avisa.mvaadako lokassa, paapaana.m akara.na.m sukha.m, catunna.m mahaabhuutaana.m upaadaaya pasaado, acchariyo arajakena vatthaana.m raago, acchariyo agopaalakena gaaviina.m doho.
[03] ^b^tathaa saricchaadiina.m kammani^eb^ -- maatu sarati, maatara.m sarati, na tesa.m koci sarati, sattaana.m kammappaccayaa, puttassa icchati, puttamicchati.
[03] ^b^karotissa^eb^ ^a^M0.0170^ea^ ^b^patiyatane ca^eb^ -- patiyatana.m abhisa"nkhaaro, udakassa patikurute, udaka.m patikurute, ka.n.dassa patikurute, ka.n.da.m patikurute.

[03] ^b^pa~ncamiyatthe parihaanibhayatthayoge^eb^ -- assavanataa dhammassa parihaayanti, ki.m nu kho aha.m tassa sukhassa bhaayaami, sabbe tasanti da.n.dassa, sabbe bhaayanti maccuno, bhiito catunna.m aasivisaana.m iccaadi.
[03] ^b^kvacii^eb^ti ki.m? gambhiira~nca katha.m kattaa, kaalena dhammi.m katha.m bhaasitaa hoti, paresa.m pu~n~naani anumoditaa, bujjhitaa saccaani, ka.ta.m kaarako, pasavo ghaatako.
[03] tathaa ^b^na ni.t.thaadiisu ca^eb^ -- sukhakaamii vihaara.m kato, ratha.m katavanto, ratha.m kataavii, ka.ta.m katvaa, ka.ta.m karonto, ka.ta.m karaano, ka.ta.m kurumaano iccaadi.
[03] aadhaariiyati asminti ^b^aadhaaro,^eb^ adhikara.na.m. kattukammasamavetaana.m nisajjapacanaadikriyaana.m pati.t.thaana.t.thena yo aadhaaro, ta.m kaaraka.m okaasasa~n~na.m hoti.
[03] ka.te ^a^M0.0171^ea^ nisiidati devadatto, thaaliya.m odana.m pacati. ettha hi devadattata.n.dulaana.m kattukammaana.m dhaara.nato ta.msamaveta.m aasanapacanasa"nkhaata.m kriya.m dhaareti naama.
[03] so panaayamokaaso catubbidho byaapiko opasilesiko saamiipiko vesayikoti.

[03] tattha ^b^byaapiko^eb^ naama yattha sakalopi aadhaarabhuuto attho aadheyyena pattha.to hoti, yasmi~nca aadheyyabhuuta.m ki~nci byaapetvaa ti.t.thati, ta.m yathaa -- tilesu tela.m atthi, khiilesu jala.m, dadhimhi sappiiti.

[03] ^b^opasilesiko^eb^ naama paccekasiddhaana.m bhaavaana.m yattha upasilesena upagamo hoti, yasmi~nca aadheyyo upasilissati alliiyitvaa ti.t.thati, ta.m yathaa -- aasane nisinno sa"ngho, thaaliya.m odana.m pacati, gha.tesu udaka.m atthi, duure .thito, samiipe .thitoti.

[03] ^b^saamiipiko^eb^ naama yattha samiipe samiipivohaara.m katvaa tadaayattavuttitaadiipanattha.m aadhaarabhaavo vikappiiyati, ta.m yathaa -- ga"ngaaya.m ghoso vasati, ga"ngaaya samiipe vajo vasatiiti attho. bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane, saavatthiyaa samiipeti attho.

[03] ^b^vesayiko^eb^ naama yattha a~n~natthaabhaavavasena, desantaraavacchedavasena vaa aadhaarabhaavo parikappo, ta.m yathaa -- aakaase saku.naa pakkhanti, bhuumiisu manussaa caranti, jalesu macchaa, paadesu patito, paapasmi.m ramatii mano, pasanno buddhasaasane, pa~n~naaya saadhu, vinaye nipu.no, maatari saadhu, pitari nipu.no iccaadi.
[03] sabbopi ^a^M0.0172^ea^ caayamaadhaaro padhaanavasena vaa parikappitavasena vaa kriyaaya pati.t.thaa bhavatiiti ^b^okaaso^eb^tveva vuttoti veditabbo.
[03] saamii issara adhipati daayaada sakkhipatibhuu pasuuta kusalaiccetehi yoge cha.t.thiivibhatti hoti, sattamii ca. ubhayattha.m vacana.m.

[03] gava.m saami, gosu saami, gava.m issaro, gosu issaro, gava.m adhipati, gosu adhipati, gava.m daayaado, gosu daayaado, gava.m sakkhi, gosu sakkhi, gava.m patibhuu, gosu patibhuu, gava.m pasuuto, gosu pasuuto, gava.m kusalo, gosu kusalo.

[03] niiharitvaa dhaara.na.m ^b^niddhaara.na.m,^eb^ jaati gu.na kriyaa naamehi samudaayato ekadesassa puthakkara.na.m, tasmi.m niddhaara.natthe gamyamaane ^a^M0.0173^ea^ tato samudaayavaacili"ngamhaa cha.t.thiivibhatti hoti, sattamii ca.

[03] manussaana.m khattiyo suuratamo, manussesu khattiyo suuratamo, ka.nhaa gaaviina.m sampannakhiiratamaa, ka.nhaa gaaviisu sampannakhiiratamaa, addhikaana.m dhaavanto siighatamo, addhikesu dhaavanto siighatamo, aayasmaa aanando arahata.m a~n~nataro ahosi, arahantesu vaa iccaadi.
[03] anaadare gamyamaane bhaavavataa li"ngamhaa cha.t.thiivibhatti hoti, sattamii ca. akaamakaana.m maataapituuna.m rudantaana.m pabbaji, maataapituusu rudantesu pabbaji.
[03] ^b^kammatthe^eb^ -- bhikkhuusu abhivaadenti, muddhani cumbitvaa, purisassa baahaasu gahetvaa.
[03] ^b^kara.natthe^eb^ -- hatthesu pi.n.daaya caranti, pattesu pi.n.daaya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, sopi ma.m anusaaseyya, sampa.ticchaami matthake.

[03] ^b^nimittatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0174^ea^-- diipi cammesu ha~n~nate, ku~njaro dantesu ha~n~nate, a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, sampajaanamusaavaade paacittiya.m, musaavaadanimitta.m musaavaadappaccayaati attho.
[03] sampadaanatthe ca li"ngamhaa sattamiivibhatti hoti. sa"nghe dinna.m mahapphala.m, sa"nghe gotami dehi, sa"nghe te dinne aha~nceva puujito bhavissaami.
[21] yaa palaalamaya.m maala.m, naarii datvaana cetiye.
[03] pa~ncamyatthe ca li"ngamhaa sattamiivibhatti hoti. kadaliisu gaje rakkhanti.

[03] ^b^kaalo^eb^ naama nimesa kha.na laya muhutta pubba.nhaadiko, ^b^bhaavo^eb^ naama kriyaa, saa cettha kriyantaruupalakkha.naava adhippetaa, tasmi.m kaalatthe ca bhaavalakkha.ne bhaavatthe ca li"ngamhaa sattamiivibhatti hoti.

[03] ^b^kaale^eb^ -- pubba.nhasamaye gato, saayanhasamaye aagato, akaale vassati tassa, kaale tassa na vassati, phussamaasamhaa tiisu maasesu vesaakhamaaso, ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji cakkhumaa.

[03] ^b^bhaavenabhaavalakkha.ne^eb^ ^a^M0.0175^ea^-- bhikkhusa"nghesu bhojiiyamaanesu gato, bhuttesu aagato, gosu duyhamaanaasu gato, duddhaasu aagato, jaayamaane kho saariputta bodhisatte aya.m dasasahassilokadhaatu sa.mkampi sampakampi sampavedhi.
[03] dvipadamida.m. adhikatthe, issaratthe ca vattamaanehi ^b^upaadhi^eb^iccetehi yoge adhikissaravacane gamyamaane li"ngamhaa sattamiivibhatti hoti.

[03] ^b^adhikavacane^eb^ -- upa khaariya.m do.no, khaariyaa do.no adhikoti attho. tathaa upa nikkhe kahaapa.na.m, adhi devesu buddho, sammutiupapattivisuddhidevasa"nkhaatehi tividhehipi devehi sabba~n~nuu buddhova adhikoti attho.
[03] ^b^issaravacane^eb^ -- adhi brahmadatte pa~ncaalaa, brahmadattissaraa pa~ncaalaati attho.

[03] ma.n.ditaussukkaiccetesvatthesu gamyamaanesu li"ngamhaa tatiyaavibhatti hoti, sattamii ca. ^b^ma.n.dita^eb^saddo panettha pasannatthavaacako, ^b^ussukka^eb^saddo saiihattho. ~naa.nena pasanno, ~naa.nasmi.m pasanno, ~naa.nena ussukko, ~naa.nasmi.m ussukko sappuriso.
[22] pabhedaa sattadhaa kamma.m, kattaa pa~ncavidho bhave..
[21] kara.na.m duvidha.m hoti, sampadaana.m tidhaa mata.m.
[03] vibhattiyo pana paccattavacanaadivasena a.t.thavidhaa bhavanti. yathaaha
[03] ^b^atha naamameva^eb^ a~n~nama~n~nasambandhiina.m samaasoti naamanissitattaa, saya~nca naamikattaa naamaanantara.m ^b^samaaso^eb^ vuccate.
[03] so ca sa~n~naavasena chabbidho abyayiibhaavo kammadhaarayo digu tappuriso bahubbiihi dvando caati.

[03] ``upanagara.m''itiidha -- ^b^upa^eb^saddato pa.thamekavacana.m ^b^si,^eb^ tassa upasaggaparattaa ``sabbaasamaavusopasagganipaataadiihi caa''ti lopo, ^b^nagara^eb^saddato cha.t.thekavacana.m ^b^sa,^eb^ nagarassa samiipanti a~n~napadena viggahe --

[03] ^b^upasagga^eb^pubbako, ^b^nipaata^eb^pubbako ca naamiko yuttattho teheva attapubbakehi upasagganipaatehi saha nicca.m samasiiyate, so ca samaaso ^b^abyayiibhaava^eb^sa~n~no hoti. idha abyayiibhaavaadisa~n~naavidhaayakasuttaaneva vaa sa~n~naavidhaanamukhena samaasavidhaayakaaniiti da.t.thabbaani.

[03] tattha ^b^abyaya^eb^miti upasagganipaataana.m sa~n~naa, li"ngavacanabhedepi byayarahitattaa, abyayaana.m attha.m vibhaavayatiiti ^b^abyayiibhaavo^eb^ abyayatthapubba"ngamattaa, anabyaya.m abyaya.m bhavatiiti vaa ^a^M0.0178^ea^ abyayiibhaavo. pubbapadatthappadhaano hi abyayiibhaavo, ettha ca ``upasagganipaatapubbako''ti vuttattaa upasagganipaataanameva pubbanipaato.
[03] tesa.m naamaana.m payujjamaanapadatthaana.m yo yuttattho, so samaasasa~n~no hoti, tada~n~na.m vaakyamiti ru.lha.m.

[03] duvidha~ncassa samasana.m saddasamasanamatthasamasana~nca, tadubhayampi luttasamaase paripu.n.nameva labbhati. aluttasamaase pana atthasamasanameva vibhattilopaabhaavato, tatthaapi vaa ekapadattuupagamanato duvidhampi labbhateva. dve hi samaasassa payojanaani ekapadattamekavibhattitta~ncaati.

[03] yutto attho ^b^yuttatto,^eb^ atha vaa yutto sa"ngato, sambandho vaa attho yassa soya.m yuttattho, etena sa"ngatatthena ^b^yuttattha^eb^vacanena bhinnatthaana.m ekatthiibhaavo samaasalakkha.nanti vutta.m hoti. ettha ca ``naamaana''nti vacanena ``devadatto pacatii''tiaadiisu aakhyaatena samaaso na hotiiti dasseti. sambandhatthena pana ^b^yuttattha^eb^ggaha.nena ``bha.to ra~n~no putto devadattassaa''tiaadiisu a~n~nama~n~naanapekkhesu, ``devadattassa ka.nhaa dantaa''tiaadiisu ca a~n~nasaapekkhesu ^a^M0.0179^ea^ ayuttatthataaya samaaso na hotiiti diipeti.

[03] idha padantarena vaa taddhitappaccayehi vaa ^b^aayaa^eb^dippaccayehi vaa ekatthiibhuutaa yuttatthaa naama, tena ``tesa.m yuttatthaana.m samaasaana.m, taddhitaa^b^yaa^eb^dippaccayantaana~nca vibhattiyo lopaniiyaa hontii''ti attho. ^b^samaasa^eb^ggaha.naadhikaare pana sati ^b^tesa.m^eb^gaha.nena vaa taddhitaa^b^yaa^eb^dippaccayanta vibhattilopo. ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.na.m ``pabha"nkaro''tiaadiisu lopanivattanattha.m.

[03] luttaasu vibhattiisu sarantassa assa yuttatthabhuutassa tividhassapi li"ngassa pakatibhaavo hoti. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ki.msamudaya idappaccayataa^eb^diisu niggahiitantassapi. nimittaabhaave nemittakaabhaavassa idha anicchitattaa ayamatideso.
[03] sakatthavirahenidha samaasassa ca li"ngabhaavaabhaavaa vibhattuppattiyamasampattaaya.m naamabyapadesaatidesamaaha.

[03] taddhitantaa ^a^M0.0180^ea^, kitantaa, samaasaa ca naamamiva da.t.thabbaa ^b^tavetuna tvaana tvaa^eb^dippaccayante vajjetvaa. ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.na.m kiccappaccaya^b^aaiiinii^eb^itthippaccayantaadissapi naamabyapadesattha.m. idha ^b^samaasa^eb^ggaha.na.m atthavata.m samudaayaana.m naamabyapadeso samaasassevaati niyamatthanti apare.

[03] so abyayiibhaavasamaaso napu.msakali"ngova da.t.thabboti napu.msakali"ngatta.m. ettha hi satipi li"ngaatidese ``adhipa~n~na''ntiaadiisu ``adhi~naa.na.m''ntiaadi ruupappasa"ngo na hoti saddantarattaa, ``tipa~n~na''ntiaadiisu viyaati da.t.thabba.m, na caaya.m atideso, sutte atidesali"ngassa ^b^iva^eb^saddassa adassanato. pure viya syaadyuppatti.
[03] tasmaa akaarantaa abyayiibhaavaa paraasa.m vibhattiina.m kvaci ^b^a.m^eb^ hoti, sesa.m neyya.m.
[03] ta.m upanagara.m, nagarassa samiipa.m ti.t.thatiiti attho. taani upanagara.m, aalapanepeva.m, ta.m upanagara.m passa, taani upanagara.m.

[03] tena upanagara.m kata.m, upanagarena vaa, tehi upanagara.m, upanagarehi vaa, tassa upanagara.m dehi, tesa.m upanagara.m, upanagaraa aanaya, upanagaramhaa upanagarasmaa, upanagarehi, upanagara.m santaka.m, upanagarassa vaa, tesa.m upanagara.m, upanagaraana.m vaa ^a^M0.0181^ea^, upanagara.m nidhehi, upanagaramhi upanagarasmi.m, upanagara.m upanagaresu vaa. eva.m upakumbha.m.
[03] ^b^vicchaaya.m^eb^ -- attaanamattaana.m pati paccatta.m, addhamaasa.m addhamaasa.m anu anvaddhamaasa.m.
[03] ^b^pa.tilome^eb^ -- sotassa pa.tiloma.m pa.tisota.m, pa.tipatha.m, pativaata.m, attaana.m adhikicca pavattaa ajjhatta.m.
[03] ^b^pariyaadaabhividhiisu^eb^ aapaa.nako.tiyaa aapaa.nako.tika.m, ``kvaci samaasantagataanamakaaranto''ti ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo, aakumaarehi yaso kaccaayanassa aakumaara.m.
[03] ^b^samiddhiya.m^eb^ -- bhikkhaaya samiddhiiti atthe samaaseva napu.msakali"ngatte ca kate --

[03] napu.msake vattamaanassa samaasassa anto saro rasso hoti. ettha ca ^b^abyayiibhaava^eb^ggaha.na.m naanuvattetabba.m, tena digudvandabahubbiihiisupi napu.msake vattamaanassa samaasantassarassa rassatta.m siddha.m hoti. ``a.m vibhattiina''miccaadinaa ^b^a^eb^maadeso, subhikkha.m. ga"ngaaya samiipe vattatiiti upaga"nga.m, ma.nikaaya samiipa.m upama.nika.m.

[03] ^b^a^eb^kaarantato a~n~nasmaa abyayiibhaavasamaasaa paraasa.m vibhattiina.m lopo ca hoti. adhitti, itthiisu adhikicca kathaa pavattatiiti attho. adhitthi passa, adhitthi kata.m iccaadi, eva.m adhikumaari, vadhuyaa samiipa.m upavadhu, gunna.m samiipa.m upagu, ^b^o^eb^kaarassa rassatta.m ^b^u^eb^kaaro. eva.m ^b^upasaggapubbako^eb^.

[03] ^b^nipaatapubbako^eb^ yathaa -- vu.d.dhaana.m pa.tipaa.ti, ye ye vu.d.dhaa vaa yathaavu.d.dha.m, ^b^padatthaanatikkame^eb^ -- yathaakkama.m, yathaasatti, yathaabala.m karoti, balamanatikkamitvaa karotiiti attho. jiivassa yattako paricchedo yaavajiiva.m, yaavataayuka.m, ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo. yattakena attho yaavadattha.m, pabbatassa parabhaago tiropabbata.m, tiropaakaara.m, tiroku.t.ta.m, paasaadassa anto antopaasaada.m, antonagara.m, antovassa.m, nagarassa bahi bahinagara.m, paasaadassa upari uparipaasaada.m, uparima~nca.m, ma~ncassa he.t.thaa he.t.thaama~nca.m, he.t.thaapaasaada.m, bhattassa pure purebhatta.m, eva.m pacchaabhatta.m.
[03] ^b^saakallatthe^eb^ -- saha makkhikaaya samakkhika.m bhu~njati, na ki~nci parivajjetiiti attho. ``tesu vuddhii''tiaadinaa ^b^saha^eb^saddassa ^b^saa^eb^deso. ga"ngaaya ora.m oraga"ngamiccaadi.

[03] so ca navavidho visesanapubbapado visesanuttarapado visesanobhayapado upamaanuttarapado sambhaavanaapubbapado avadhaara.napubbapado ^b^na^eb^nipaatapubbapado ^b^ku^eb^pubbapado ^b^paa^eb^dipubbapado caati.

[03] tattha ^b^visesanapubbapado^eb^ taava -- ``mahanta purisa''itiidha ubhayattha pa.thamekavacana.m ^b^si,^eb^ tulyaadhikara.nabhaavappasiddhattha.m ^b^ca^eb^sadda ^b^ta^eb^saddappayogo, mahanto ca so puriso caati viggahe --
[03] ito para.m ``vibhaasaa rukkhati.na''iccaadito ``vibhaasaa''ti samaasavidhaane sabbattha vattate.
[03] dve padaani naamikaani tulyaadhikara.naani a~n~nama~n~nena saha vibhaasaa samasyante, tasmi.m dvipade tulyaadhikara.ne sati so samaaso kammadhaarayasa~n~no ca hoti.

[03] dve padaani ^b^dvipada.m,^eb^ tulya.m samaana.m adhikara.na.m attho yassa padadvayassa ta.m ^b^tulyaadhikara.na.m,^eb^ tasmi.m dvipade tulyaadhikara.ne. bhinnappavattinimittaana.m dvinna.m padaana.m visesanavisesitabbabhaavena ekasmi.m atthe pavatti ^b^tulyaadhikara.nataa^eb^. kammamiva dvaya.m dhaarayatiiti ^b^kammadhaarayo^eb^. yathaa hi kamma.m kriya~nca payojana~nca dvaya.m dhaarayati, kamme sati kriyaaya, payojanassa ca sambhavato, tathaa aya.m samaaso ekassa atthassa dve naamaani dhaarayati, tasmi.m samaase sati ^b^e^eb^katthajotakassa naamadvayassa sambhavato.
[03] pure ^a^M0.0184^ea^ viya samaasasa~n~naavibhattilopapakatibhaavaa, samaaseneva tulyaadhikara.nabhaavassa vuttattaa ``vuttatthaanamappayogo''ti ^b^ca^eb^sadda ^b^ta^eb^saddaanamappayogo.

[03] ^b^mahanta^eb^ saddassa ^b^mahaa^eb^ hoti tulyaadhikara.ne uttarapade pare. ^b^mahata^eb^nti bahuvacanaggaha.nena kvaci ^b^maha^eb^aadeso ca, ettha ca visesanassa pubbanipaato visesanabhuutassa pubbapadassa ^b^mahaa^eb^desavidhaanatova vi~n~naayati.

[03] tassa puriso tappuriso, tappurisasadisattaa ayampi samaaso anvatthasa~n~naaya ^b^tappuriso^eb^ti vutto. yathaa hi ^b^tappurisa^eb^saddo gu.namativatto, tathaa aya.m samaasopi. uttarapadatthappadhaano hi tappurisoti. tato naamabyapadeso syaadyuppatti. aya.m pana tappuriso abhidheyyavacano, parali"ngo ca.

[03] mahaapuriso, mahaapurisaa iccaadi ^b^purisa^eb^saddasama.m, eva.m mahaaviiro, mahaamuni, mahanta~nca ta.m bala~ncaati mahaabala.m, mahabbhaya.m, ^b^maha^eb^aadeso. santo ca so puriso caati sappuriso, ``santasaddassa so bhe bo cante''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^santa^eb^saddassa samaase a^b^bha^eb^kaarepi ^b^saa^eb^deso, tathaa pubbapuriso, parapuriso, pa.thamapuriso, majjhimapuriso, uttamapuriso, dantapuriso, paramapuriso, viirapuriso, setahatthii, ka.nhasappo, niiluppala.m, lohitacandana.m.
[03] kvaci ^a^M0.0185^ea^ vibhaasaadhikaarato na bhavati, yathaa -- pu.n.no mantaaniputto, citto gahapati, sakko devaraajaati.
[03] pumaa ca so kokilo caati atthe samaase kate --
[03] ^b^puma^eb^iccetassa anto ^b^a^eb^kaaro lopamaapajjate ^b^li"ngaa^eb^diisu parapadesu samaasesu, ``a.mmo niggahiita.m jhalapehii''ti ^b^ma^eb^kaarassa niggahiita.m. pu"nkokilo. eva.m punnaago.
[03] khattiyaa ca saa ka~n~naa caati viggayha samaase kate --
[03] ``tulyaadhikara.ne, pade, itthiya.m bhaasitapumitthii pumaava ce''ti ca vattate.

[03] kammadhaarayasa~n~ne ca samaase itthiya.m vattamaane tulyaadhikara.ne uttarapade pare pubbabhuuto itthivaacako saddo pubbe bhaasitapumaa ce, so pumaa iva da.t.thabboti pubbapade itthippaccayassa nivatti hoti.
[03] khattiyaka~n~naa, khattiyaka~n~naayo iccaadi. eva.m rattalataa, dutiyabhikkhaa, braahma.nii ca saa daarikaa caati braahma.nadaarikaa, naagamaa.navikaa.
[03] pubbapadassevaaya.m pumbhaavaatideso, tena ``khattiyakumaarii kumaarasama.nii taru.nabraahma.nii''tiaadiisu uttarapadesu itthippaccayassa na nivatti hoti.
[03] ^b^bhaasitapumaa^eb^ti ki.m? ga"ngaanadii, ta.nhaanadii, pathaviidhaatu. ``nandaapokkhara.nii, nandaadevii''tiaadiisu pana sa~n~naasaddattaa na hoti.

[03] tathaa puratthimo ca so kaayo caati puratthimakaayo, ettha ca kaayekadeso ^b^kaaya^eb^saddo. eva.m pacchimakaayo, he.t.thimakaayo, uparimakaayo, sabbakaayo, puraa.navihaaro, navaavaaso, kataranikaayo, katamanikaayo, hetuppaccayo, abahula.m bahula.m katanti bahuliikata.m, jiivitappadhaana.m navaka.m jiivitanavaka.m iccaadi.

[03] ^b^visesanuttarapade^eb^ jinavacanaanuparodhato theraacariyapa.n.ditaadi visesana.m para~nca bhavati. yathaa -- saariputto ca so thero caati saariputtatthero. eva.m mahaamoggallaanatthero, mahaakassapatthero, buddhaghosaacariyo, dhammapaalaacariyo, aacariyaguttiloti vaa, mahosadho ca so pa.n.dito caati mahosadhapa.n.dito. eva.m vidhurapa.n.dito, vatthuviseso.

[03] ^b^visesanobhayapado^eb^ yathaa -- siita~nca ta.m u.nha~ncaati siitu.nha.m, siniddho ca so u.nho caati siniddhu.nho, maaso. kha~njo ca so khujjo caati kha~njakhujjo. eva.m andhabadhiro, kataakata.m, chiddaavachidda.m, uccaavaca.m, chinnabhinna.m, sittasamma.t.tha.m, gatapaccaagata.m.

[03] ^b^upamaanuttarapade^eb^ abhidhaanaanurodhato upamaanabhuuta.m visesana.m para.m bhavati. yathaa -- siiho viya siiho, muni ca so siiho caati munisiiho. eva.m munivasabho, munipu"ngavo, buddhanaago, buddhaadicco, ra.msi viya ra.msi, saddhammo ca ^a^M0.0187^ea^ so ra.msi caati saddhammara.msi. eva.m vinayasaagaro, pu.n.dariikamiva pu.n.dariiko, sama.no ca so pu.n.dariiko caati sama.napu.n.dariiko, sama.napadumo. cando viya cando, mukha~nca ta.m cando caati mukhacando. eva.m mukhapaduma.m iccaadi.

[03] ^b^sambhaavanaapubbapado^eb^ yathaa -- dhammo iti buddhi dhammabuddhi. eva.m dhammasa~n~naa, dhammasa"nkhaato, dhammasammato, paa.nasa~n~nitaa, asubhasa~n~naa, aniccasa~n~naa, anattasa~n~naa, dhaatusa~n~naa, dhiitusa~n~naa, attasa~n~naa, atthisa~n~naa, attadi.t.thi iccaadi.

[03] ^b^avadhaara.napubbapado^eb^ yathaa -- gu.no eva dhana.m gu.nadhana.m. eva.m saddhaadhana.m, siiladhana.m, pa~n~naadhana.m, cakkhu eva indriya.m cakkhundriya.m. eva.m cakkhaayatana.m, cakkhudhaatu, cakkhudvaara.m, ruupaaramma.namiccaadi.
[03] ^b^nanipaatapubbapado^eb^ yathaa -- na braahma.noti atthe kammadhaarayasamaase, vibhattilopaadimhi ca kate --
[03] ^b^na^eb^ssa nipaatapadassa tappurise uttarapade pare sabbasseva ^b^a^eb^tta.m hoti. tappurisekadesattaa tappuriso, abraahma.no.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0188^ea^ yo ``asuuriyapassaa raajadaaraa''tiaadiisu viya uttarapadatthassa sabbathaa abhaava.m diipeti, so ^b^pasajjappa.tisedhavaacii^eb^ naama. yo pana ``abraahma.na amanussaa''tiaadiisu viya uttarapadattha.m pariyudaasitvaa ta.msadise vatthumhi kaariya.m pa.tipaadayati, so ^b^pariyudaasavaacii^eb^ naama.

[03] vuccate -- ^b^braahma.naa^eb^disaddaana.m braahma.naadiatthasseva ta.msadisaadiatthassaapi vaacakattaa, ^b^braahma.naa^eb^disaddaa hi kevalaabraahma.naadiatthesveva paaka.taa, ^b^bhuu^eb^saddo viyasattaaya.m, yadaa te pana a~n~nena sadisaadivaacakena ^b^na^eb^iti nipaatena yujjanti, tadaa ta.msadisatada~n~natabbiruddhatadabhaavesupi vattanti, ^b^bhuu^eb^saddo viya ^b^anvabhi^eb^yaadiyoge anubhavanaabhibhavanaadiisu, tasmaa uttarapadatthajotakoyevettha ^b^na^eb^iti nipaatoti na doso, tena abraahma.noti braahma.nasadisoti vutta.m hoti. eva.m amanusso, assama.no.
[03] ^b^viruddhatthe^eb^ -- na kusalaa akusalaa, kusalapa.tipakkhaati attho. eva.m alobho, amitto.
[03] ^b^pasajjappa.tisedhe^eb^ -- na katvaa akatvaa, akaatuna pu~n~na.m akaronto.
[03] ^b^na^eb^iccetassa padassa tappurise uttarapade ^b^ana^eb^ hoti sare pare.
[03] ^b^na^eb^ asso anasso, na ariyo anariyo. eva.m anissaro, ani.t.tho, anupavaado, na aadaaya anaadaaya, anoloketvaa iccaadi.
[03] ^b^kupubbapado^eb^ yathaa -- kucchitamannanti niccasamaasattaa a~n~napadena viggaho, kammadhaarayasamaase kate --
[03] ^b^ku^eb^iccetassa nipaatassa tappurise uttarapade ^b^kada^eb^ hoti sare pare. kadanna.m. eva.m kadasana.m.
