[03] taasa.m vibhattiina.m parassapadaana'mattanopadaana~nca ^b^dve dve^eb^ vacanaani yathaakkama.m ^b^pa.thamamajjhimuttamapurisa^eb^sa~n~naani honti. ta.m yathaa? ^b^ti anti^eb^iti pa.thamapurisaa, ^b^si tha^eb^iti majjhimapurisaa, ^b^mi ma^eb^iti uttamapurisaa. attanopadesupi ^b^te ante^eb^iti pa.thamapurisaa, ^b^se vhe^eb^iti majjhimapurisaa, ^b^e mhe^eb^iti uttamapurisaa. eva.m sesaasu sattasu vibhattiisupi yojetabbanti ^a^M0.0261^ea^. eva.m a.t.thavibhattivasena channavutividhe aakhyaatapade dvatti.msa dvatti.msa pa.thamamajjhimauttamapurisaa hontiiti vattamaanaparassapadaadimhi dvinna.m pa.thamapurisasa~n~naa.

[03] ^b^tumhaamha^eb^saddavajjite tulyaadhikara.nabhuute saadhakavaacake naamamhi payujjamaanepi appayujjamaanepi dhaatuuhi pa.thamapuriso hotiiti pa.thamapurisa.m katvaa, tassaapyaniyamappasa"nge kriyaasaadhakassa kattuno ekatte vattumicchite ``ekamhi vattabbe ekavacana''nti vattamaanaparassapadapa.thamapurisekavacana.m ^b^ti^eb^.
[03] ``paro, paccayo, dhaatuu''ti ca adhikaaro, ``yathaa kattari caa''ti ito ``kattarii''ti vikara.nappaccayavidhaane sabbattha vattate.
[03] ^b^bhuu^eb^iccevamaadito dhaatuga.nato paro ^b^a^eb^paccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu paresu. sabbadhaatukamhiyevaayamissate.

[03] kaaritato a~n~nesu paccayesu asa.myogantaana.m dhaatuuna.m vuddhi hoti. ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.nena ^b^.nu^eb^ppaccayassaapi vuddhi hoti. ettha ca ``gha.taadiina.m vaa''ti ito ^b^vaa^eb^saddo anuvattetabbo, so ca vavatthitavibhaasattho. tena --
[03] ^b^o^eb^kaarassa dhaatvantassa sare pare ^b^avaa^eb^deso hoti. ``saralopo maadesa''iccaadinaa saralopaadimhi kate ``naye para.m yutte''ti paranayana.m kaatabba.m.
[03] so puriso saadhu bhavati, saa ka~n~naa saadhu bhavati, ta.m citta.m saadhu bhavati.

[03] satipi kriyaayekatte kattuuna.m bahuttaa ``bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana''nti vattamaanaparassapadapa.thamapurisabahuvacana.m ^b^anti,^eb^ pure viya appaccayavuddhiavaadesaa, saralopaadi. te purisaa bhavanti, appayujjamaanepi bhavati, bhavanti.

[03] tulyaadhikara.nabhuute ^b^tumha^eb^sadde payujjamaanepi appayujjamaanepi dhaatuuhi ^b^majjhima^eb^puriso hotiiti vattamaanaparassapadamajjhimapurisekavacana.m^b^si,^eb^ sesa.m purimasama.m. tva.m bhavasi, tumhe bhavatha, appayujjamaanepi bhavasi, bhavatha.

[03] tulyaadhikara.nabhuute ^b^amha^eb^sadde payujjamaanepi appayujjamaanepi dhaatuuhi ^b^uttama^eb^puriso hotiiti vattamaanaparassapadauttamapurisekavacana.m ^b^mi, a^eb^ppaccayavuddhi^b^avaa^eb^desaa.
[03] ^b^a^eb^kaaro ^b^diigha^eb^maapajjate ^b^himima^eb^iccetaasu vibhattiisu. aha.m bhavaami, maya.m bhavaama. bhavaami, bhavaama.
[03] sabbaasa.m vattamaanaana.m a.t.thavidhaana.m vibhattiina.m yaani yaani paraani cha padaani, taani taani ^b^attanopada^eb^sa~n~naani hontiiti ^b^te^eb^aadiina.m attanopadasa~n~naa.

[03] ^b^kattari^eb^ ca kaarake abhidheyye dhaatuuhi attanopadaani honti. ^b^ca^eb^ggaha.na.m katthaci nivattanattha.m, sesa.m parassapade vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavaamhe.

[03] ^b^paca^eb^ paake, dhaatusa~n~naaya.m dhaatvantalopo, vuttanayeneva ^b^tyaa^eb^dyuppatti, iva.n.nuva.n.naanamabhaavaa vuddhiabhaavovettha viseso. so devadatto odana.m pacati, pacanti, pacasi ^a^M0.0264^ea^, pacatha, pacaami, pacaama, so odana.m pacate, te pacante, tva.m pacase, tumhe pacavhe, aha.m pace, maya.m pacaamhe.

[03] sabbesa.m pa.thamamajjhimaana.m, pa.thamuttamaana.m, majjhimuttamaana.m ti.n.na.m vaa purisaana.m ekatobhidhaane kaatabbe paro puriso yojetabbo. ekakaalaanamevaabhidhaane caaya.m. so ca pacati, tva~nca pacasiiti pariyaayappasa"nge ^b^tumhe pacathaa^eb^ti bhavati. eva.m so ca pacati, aha~nca pacaamiiti ^b^maya.m pacaama,^eb^ tathaa tva~nca pacasi, aha~nca pacaami, ^b^maya.m pacaama,^eb^ so ca pacati, tva~nca pacasi, aha~nca pacaami, ^b^maya.m pacaama^eb^. eva.m sabbattha yojetabba.m.
[03] ^b^ekaabhidhaane^eb^ti kimattha.m? ``so ca pacati, tva~nca pacissasi, aha.m paci.m'' ettha bhinnakaalattaa ``maya.m pacimhaa''ti na bhavati.
[03] ^b^gamu sappa^eb^ gatimhi, pure viya dhaatusa~n~naaya.m dhaatvantalopo.

[03] ^b^gamu^eb^iccetassa dhaatussanto ^b^ma^eb^kaaro ^b^ccho^eb^ hoti vaa sabbaasu vibhattiisu, ^b^sabba^eb^ggaha.nena ^b^maananta ya^eb^ kaaritappaccayesu ca. vavatthitavibhaasatthoya.m ^b^vaa^eb^saddo. tenaaya.m --
[21] vidhi.m nicca~nca vaasaddo, maana'ntesu tu kattari.

[03] appaccayaparanayanaani ^a^M0.0265^ea^, so puriso gaama.m gacchati, te gacchanti, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa garupubbarassato parassa pa.thamapurisabahuvacanassa ^b^re^eb^ vaa hoti, gacchare. tva.m gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha. aha.m gacchaami, maya.m gacchaama.
[03] ^b^cchaa^eb^desaabhaave ``lopa~ncettamakaaro''ti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayassa ^b^e^eb^kaaro. gameti, gamenti, saralopo. gamesi, gametha. gamemi, gamema.
[03] attanopadepi so gaama.m gacchate, gacchante, gacchare. gacchase, gacchavhe. gacche, gacchaamhe.
[03] ``kuto nu tva.m aagacchasi, raajagahato aagacchaamii''tiaadiisu pana paccuppannasamiipe vattamaanavacana.m.
[03] ^b^gamu^eb^iccetassa dhaatussa sabbassa ^b^ghammaa^eb^deso hoti vaa. ghammati, ghammanti iccaadi.

[03] ^b^bhaave^eb^ ca ^b^kammani^eb^ ca kaarake abhidheyye attanopadaani honti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena kammakattaripi. bhavana.m ^b^bhaavo,^eb^ so ca kaarakantarena asa.msa.t.tho kevalo bhavanalavanaadiko dhaatvattho. kariiyatiiti ^b^kamma.m^eb^. akammakaapi dhaatavo sopasaggaa sakammakaapi bhavanti, tasmaa kammani anupubbaa bhuudhaatuto vattamaanattanopadapa.thamapurisekavacana.m ^b^te^eb^.

[03] sabbadhaatuuhi paro bhaavakammesu ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayo hoti. attanopadavisayevaayamissate, ``a~n~nesu caa''ti sutte anuvattita^b^vaa^eb^ggaha.nena ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye vuddhi na bhavati, anubhuuyate sukha.m devadattena.
[03] anubhuuyante sampattiyo tayaa. anubhuuyase tva.m devadattena, anubhuuyavhe tumhe. aha.m anubhuuye tayaa, maya.m anubhuuyaamhe.

[03] attanopadaani kvaci parassapadattamaapajjante, akattariyeveta.m. ^b^ya^eb^kaarassa dvitta.m, anubhuuyyati mayaa sukha.m, anubhuuyyate vaa, anubhuuyyanti. anubhuuyyasi, anubhuuyyatha. anubhuuyyaami, anubhuuyyaama. dvittaabhaave -- anubhuuyati, anubhuuyanti.
[03] bhaave adabbavuttino bhaavassekattaa ^b^e^eb^kavacanameva, ta~nca pa.thamapurisasseva, bhuuyate devadattena, devadattena sampati bhavananti attho.
[03] pacadhaatuto ^a^M0.0267^ea^ kammani attanopade yappaccaye ca kate --

[03] tassa bhaavakammavisayassa ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayassa ^b^ca^eb^vagga^b^ya^eb^kaara^b^va^eb^kaaratta.m hoti dhaatvantena saha yathaasambhava.m. ettha ^b^ca^eb^ ``iva.n.naagamo vaa''ti ito siihagatiyaa ^b^vaa^eb^saddo anuvattetabbo, so ^b^ca^eb^ vavatthitavibhaasattho. tena --
[21] cavaggo ca ta vaggaana.m, dhaatvantaana.m yavattana.m.

[03] dhaatvantassa cavaggaadittaa ^b^ca^eb^kaare kate ``paradvebhaavo .thaane''ti ^b^ca^eb^kaarassa dvitta.m. paccate odano devadattena, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa garupubbarassato parassa pa.thamapurisabahuvacanassa kvaci ^b^re^eb^ hoti. paccare, paccante. paccase, paccavhe. pacce, paccaamhe.
[03] parassapadaadese paccati, paccanti. paccasi, paccatha. paccaami, paccaama. tathaa kammakattari paccate odano sayameva, paccante. paccati, paccanti vaa iccaadi.

[03] sabbehi dhaatuuhi tasmi.m bhaavakammavisaye ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye pare iva.n.naagamo hoti vaati iikaaraagamo. vavatthitavibhaasatthoya.m ^b^vaa^eb^saddo. ^b^cchaa^eb^deso, gacchiiyate gaamo devadattena ^a^M0.0268^ea^, gacchiiyante. gacchiiyase, gacchiiyavhe. gacchiiye, gacchiiyaamhe.

[03] he.t.thaanuttehi parasseveda.m, tena ^b^ka.tapa^eb^vagga^b^ya^eb^kaara^b^lasa^eb^nteheva dhaatuuhi paro ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayo pubbaruupamaapajjate vaati ^b^ma^eb^kaaraa parassa ^b^ya^eb^kaarassa ^b^ma^eb^kaaro. gammate, gamiiyate, gammante, gamiiyante. gammase, gamiiyase, gammavhe, gamiiyavhe. gamme, gamiiye, gammaamhe, gamiiyaamhe.

[03] ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ -- gacchiiyyati, gacchiiyyanti. gacchiiyati, gacchiiyanti vaa. gammati, gammanti. gamiiyati, gamiiyanti. ^b^i^eb^kaaraagame gamiyyati, gamiyyanti. tathaa ghammiiyati, ghammiiyanti iccaadi.
[03] 450^b^.^eb^ ^b^pa~ncamii tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, ta.m anta.m, ssuvho, e aamase^eb^.

[03] satipi kaalaadhikaare puna ^b^kaala^eb^ggaha.nena ^b^vidhinimantanaajjhesanaanumatipatthanaapattakaalaa^eb^diisu ca pa~ncamii. aa.naapana^b^maa.natti,^eb^ aasiisanamaa^b^si.t.tho,^eb^ so ca i.t.thassa asampattassa ^a^M0.0269^ea^ atthassa patthana.m, tasmi.m ^b^aa.natyaasi.t.the^eb^. anu samiipe uttakaalo ^b^anuttakaalo,^eb^ paccuppannakaaloti attho, na uttakaaloti vaa anuttakaalo, tasmi.m anuttakaale, kaalamanaamasitvaa hotiiti attho.
[03] tattha ^b^aasiisanatthe^eb^ bhuudhaatuto pa~ncamiiparassapadapa.thamapurisekavacana.m ^b^tu, a^eb^ppaccayavuddhi^b^avaa^eb^desaa. so sukhii bhavatu, te sukhitaa bhavantu.
[03] ^b^a^eb^kaarato paro ^b^hi^eb^vibhatti ^b^lopa^eb^maapajjate vaa. tva.m sukhii bhava, bhavaahi vaa, himhi diigho. tumhe sukhitaa bhavatha. aha.m sukhii bhavaami, maya.m sukhino bhavaama.
[03] ^b^attanopade^eb^ so sukhii bhavata.m, te sukhitaa bhavanta.m. tva.m sukhii bhavassu, tumhe sukhitaa bhavavho. aha.m sukhii bhave, maya.m sukhitaa bhavaamase.

[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ anubhuuyata.m tayaa, anubhuuyanta.m. anubhuuyassu, anubhuuyavho. anubhuuye, anubhuuyaamase. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ anubhuuyyatu, anubhuuyyantu. anubhuuyatu, anubhuuyantu vaa, anubhuuyyaahi iccaadi. ^b^bhaave^eb^ bhuuyata.m.
[03] ^b^aa.nattiya.m kattari^eb^ devadatto daani odana.m pacatu, pacantu. paca, pacaahi, pacatha. pacaami, pacaama. pacata.m, pacanta.m. pacassu, pacavho. pace, pacaamase.

[03] ^b^kammani ya^eb^ppaccayacavaggaadi, paccata.m odano devadattena, paccanta.m. paccassu, paccavho. pacce, paccaamase. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ paccatu, paccantu. pacca, paccaahi, paccatha. paccaami, paccaama.

[03] tathaa ^a^M0.0270^ea^ so gaama.m gacchatu, gacchantu. gaccha, gacchaahi, gacchatha. gacchaami, gacchaama. gametu, gamentu. gama, gamaahi, gametha. gamemi, gamema. gacchata.m, gacchanta.m. gacchassu, gacchavho. gacche, gacchaamase. ^b^ghammaa^eb^dese ghammatu, ghammantu iccaadi.
[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ gacchiiyata.m, gacchiiyatu, gamiiyata.m, gamiiyatu, gammata.m, gammatu iccaadi.
[03] ^b^vidhimhi^eb^ idha pabbato hotu, aya.m paasaado suva.n.namayo hotuutiaadi.
[03] ^b^nimantane^eb^ adhivaasetu me bhante bhagavaa bhojana.m, idha nisiidatu bhava.m.
[03] ^b^anumatiya.m^eb^ pucchatu bhava.m pa~nha.m, pavisatu bhava.m, ettha nisiidatu.
[03] ^b^patthanaa^eb^ yaacanaa, dadaahi me gaamavaraani pa~nca, eka.m me nayana.m dehi.
[03] ^b^pattakaale^eb^ sampatto te kaalo ka.takara.ne, ka.ta.m karotu bhava.m iccaadi.
[03] 453^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattamii eyya eyyu.m, eyyaasi eyyaatha, eyyaamieyyaama, etha era.m, etho eyyaavho, eyya.meyyaamhe^eb^.
[03] anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakaale ^b^sattamii^eb^vibhatti hoti.

[03] ^b^attha^eb^ggaha.nena ^b^vidhinimantanaa^eb^diisu ca sattamii. kattumicchato parassa anujaanana.m ^b^anumati,^eb^ parikappana.m ^b^parikappo,^eb^ ``yadi naama bhaveyyaa''ti sallakkha.na.m niruupana.m, hetukriyaaya sambhave phalakriyaaya sambhavaparikappo ca.

[03] tattha ^b^parikappe^eb^ sattamiiparassapadapa.thamapurisekavacana.m ^b^eyya,^eb^ appaccayavuddhaadi purimasama.m, ``kvaci dhaatu vibhattii''tiaadinaa eyya eyyaasi eyyaami eyya.miccetesa.m vikappena ekaaraadeso. so daani ki.m nu kho bhave, yadi so pa.thamavaye pabbajeyya, arahaa bhaveyya, sace sa"nkhaaraa niccaa bhaveyyu.m, na nirujjheyyu.m. yadi tva.m bhaveyyaasi, tumhe bhaveyyaatha. kathamaha.m devo bhaveyyaami, ki.m nu kho maya.m bhaveyyaama. tathaa bhavetha, bhavera.m. bhavetho, bhaveyyaavho.
[03] ^b^patthane^eb^ tu aha.m sukhii bhave, buddho bhaveyya.m, bhaveyyaamhe.

[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ sukha.m tayaa anubhuuyetha, anubhuuyera.m. anubhuuyetho, anubhuuyeyyaavho. anubhuuye, anubhuuyeyya.m, anubhuuyeyyaamhe. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ anubhuuyeyya, anubhuuyeyyu.m. anubhuuyeyyaasi iccaadi. ^b^bhaave^eb^ bhuuyetha.

[02] ^b^vidhimhi^eb^ so odana.m pace, paceyya, paceyyu.m. tva.m pace, paceyyaasi, tumhe paceyyaatha. aha.m pace, paceyyaami, maya.m paceyyaama. pacetha, pacera.m. pacetho, paceyyaavho. pace, paceyya.m, paceyyaamhe.
[02] ^b^kammani^eb^ ^a^M0.0272^ea^ paccetha, paccera.m. paccetho, pacceyyaavho. pacce, pacceyya.m, pacceyyaamhe. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ pacce, pacceyya, pacceyyu.m. pacceyyaasi iccaadi.

[02] ^b^anumatiya.m^eb^ so gaama.m gacche, gaccheyya, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa ^b^eyyu^eb^ssa u.m vaa, gacchu.m, gaccheyyu.m. tva.m gacche, gaccheyyaasi, gaccheyyaatha. gacche, gaccheyyaami, gaccheyyaama. game, gameyya, gamu.m, gameyyu.m. game, gameyyaasi, gameyyaatha. game, gameyyaami, gameyyaama. gacchetha, gacchera.m. gacchetho, gaccheyyaavho. gacche, gaccheyya.m, gaccheyyaamhe. gametha, gamera.m iccaadi.

[02] ^b^kammani^eb^ gacchiiyetha, gamiiyetha, gacchiiyera.m, gamiiyera.m iccaadi. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ gacchiiyeyya, gamiiyeyya, gammeyya, gammeyyu.m iccaadi. tathaa ghamme, ghammeyya, ghammeyyu.m iccaadi.
[03] 455^b^.^eb^ ^b^hiyyattanii aauu, ottha, a.mmhaa, tthatthu.m, sevha.m, i.mmhase^eb^.
[03] hiyyopabhuti atiite kaale paccakkhe vaa appaccakkhe vaa ^b^hiyyattanii^eb^vibhatti hotiiti hiyyattaniiparassapadapa.thamapurisekavacana.m ^b^aa^eb^.
[03] kvaci dhaatuunamaadimhi ^b^a^eb^kaaraagamo hoti ^b^hiyyattaniiajjataniikaalaatipatti^eb^iccetaasu tiisu vibhattiisu. kathamayamakaaraagamo dhaatvaadimhiiti ce?

[02] tathaa agacchaa, agacchuu. agaccho, agaccha, agacchattha. agaccha.m, agacchamhaa. agacchattha, agacchatthu.m. agacchase, agacchavha.m. agacchi.m, agacchamhase. agamaa, agamuu. agamo, agama, agamattha. agama.m, agamamhaa. agamattha, agamatthu.m. agamase, agamavha.m. agami.m, agamamhase.

[03] ^b^hiyyattanaa^eb^dayo catasso vibhattiyo ^b^sabbadhaatuka^eb^sa~n~naa hontiiti hiyyattanaadiina.m sabbadhaatukasa~n~nattaa ``ikaaraagamo asabbadhaatukamhii''ti vutto ^b^i^eb^kaaraagamo na bhavati.

[21] kha cha sesu parokkhaaya.m, dvebhaavo sabbadhaatuna.m.
[03] dvebhuutassa dhaatussa yo pubbo avayavo, so ^b^abbhaasa^eb^sa~n~no hotiiti abbhaasasa~n~naa.

[03] ^b^bruubhuu^eb^iccetesa.m dhaatuuna.m ^b^aahabhuuva^eb^iccete aadesaa honti parokkhaavibhattiyanti ^b^bhuu^eb^saddassa ^b^bhuuva^eb^aadeso, ``saralopo maadesappaccayaadimhii''tiaadinaa saralopaadi, so kira raajaa babhuuva, te kira babhuuvu. tva.m kira babhuuve.

[02] abhisa"nkharoti, abhisa"nkharonti. abhisa"nkhariiyati, abhisa"nkhariiyanti. abhisa"nkharotu. abhisa"nkhareyya. abhisa"nkhari, ^b^khaa^eb^dese abhisa"nkhaasi vaa. abhisa"nkharissati. abhisa"nkharissa iccaadi.
[03] ^b^saka^eb^ sattimhi, ^b^o^eb^paccayo, sakkoti, sakkonti. sakkosi, sakkotha. sakkomi, sakkoma iccaadi.

[03] ``tathaa kattari caa''ti ito ``kattarii''ti ca siihavilokanena ^b^bhaavakamma^eb^ggaha.naani ca vattante, ma.n.duukagatiyaa ^b^kaarita^eb^ggaha.na~nca.

[03] ^b^cura^eb^iccevamaadito dhaatuga.nato ^b^.ne .naya^eb^iccete paccayaa honti kattari, bhaave ca kammani, vibhattippaccayesu. ``kaarita.m viya .naanubandho''ti ^b^.ne .nayaana.m^eb^ kaaritabyapadeso.
[03] asa.myogantassa dhaatussa kaarite pare vuddhi hotiiti ukaarassokaaro vuddhi.

[02] dhana.m coreti, corenti. coresi, coretha. coremi, corema. ^b^.naya^eb^ppaccaye -- corayati, corayanti. corayasi, corayatha. corayaami, corayaama. corayate, corayante. corayase, corayavhe. coraye, corayaamhe.

[02] coretu ^a^M0.0323^ea^, corentu. corehi. corayatu, corayantu. coraya, corayaahi.

[02] corissati, corissanti. corayissati, corayissanti. coriiyissate, coriiyissante. coriiyissati, coriiyissanti. acorissa, acorayissa. acoriiyissatha, acoriiyissa iccaadi.
[02] cinteti, cintayati, cintenti, cintayanti. cintetu, cintayatu. cinteyya, cintayeyya. acintesi, cintesi, acintayi, cintayi. cintessati, cintayissati. acintissa, acintayissa iccaadi.
[03] ^b^paala^eb^ rakkha.ne, dhamma.m paaleti, paalayati. paaliiyati. paaletu, paalayatu iccaadi.
[03] ^b^gha.ta^eb^ gha.tane, ghaa.teti, ghaa.tayati, gha.teti, gha.tayati, gha.taadittaa vikappena vuddhi.
[03] ^b^ga.na^eb^ ^a^M0.0324^ea^ sa"nkhyaane, ``gha.taadiina.m vaa''ti na vuddhi, ga.neti, ga.nayati iccaadi, sabbattha subodha.m.
[21] bhuuvaadii ca rudhaadii ca, divaadii svaadayo ga.naa.
[22] kiyaadii ca tanaadii ca, curaadii cidha sattadhaa..
[03] ``dhaatuli"ngehi paraa paccayaa''ti ito ^b^dhaatu^eb^ggaha.na.m anuvattate, ``paraa, paccayaa''ti ca adhikaaro.
[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ^b^tija gupa kita maanehi kha cha saa vaa^eb^.
[03] ^b^tija gupa kita maana^eb^ iccetehi dhaatuuhi ^b^kha cha sa^eb^ iccete paccayaa paraa honti vaa.
[21] tijato khantiya.m khova, nindaaya.m gupato tu cho.
[03] dhaatvatthe niddi.t.thehi ^b^khaa^eb^di^b^kaarita^eb^ntehi paccayehi ^b^tyaa^eb^dayo vibhattiyo hontiiti pure viya vattamaanaadayo yojetabbaa.
[03] ativaakya.m titikkhati, titikkhanti. ^b^kamme^eb^ titikkhiiyati. tathaa titikkhatu, titikkhantu. titikkheyya, titikkheyyu.m. atitikkhi, atitikkhi.msu. titikkhissati. atitikkhissa iccaadi.

[03] ^b^gupa^eb^ gopane, ^b^cha^eb^ppaccaye dvibhaavo, ``pubbobbhaaso''ti abbhaasasa~n~naa, ``abbhaasassaa''ti vattamaane ``antassiva.n.naakaaro vaa''ti abbhaasantassikaaro, ``kavaggassa cavaggo''ti abbhaasa^b^ga^eb^kaarassa ^b^ja^eb^kaaro ca.

[03] dhaatvanthassa bya~njanassa ^b^ca^eb^kaaraadeso hoti ^b^cha^eb^ppaccayesu paresu. tato vibhattiyo, kaaya.m jigucchati, jigucchanti. sesa.m purimasama.m. ^b^chaa^eb^bhaave gopeti, gopenti iccaadi.

[03] abbhaasagataana.m ^b^maana kita^eb^iccetesa.m dhaatuuna.m ^b^va^eb^kaara^b^ta^eb^kaaratta.m hoti vaa yathaakkamanti ^b^ta^eb^kaaro, dhaatvantassa ^b^ca^eb^kaaro, sesa.m sama.m. roga.m tikicchati, tikicchanti iccaadi. ^b^ta^eb^kaaraabhaave ``kavaggassa cavaggo''ti ^b^ca^eb^kaaro, vicikicchati, vicikicchanti iccaadi.

[03] tato abbhaasato paraasa.m ^b^paamaanaana.m^eb^ dhaatuuna.m ^b^vaama.miccete^eb^ aadesaa honti yathaakkama.m ^b^sa^eb^ppaccaye pare. ^b^sesuu^eb^ti bahuvacananiddeso payogepi vacanavipallaasa~naapanattha.m. attha.m viima.msati, viima.msanti iccaadi.

[03] ^b^bhuja ghasa hara su paa^eb^ iccevamaadiihi dhaatuuhi ^b^tu^eb^micchatthesu ca ^b^kha cha sa^eb^iccete paccayaa honti vaa. tumicchaana.m, tumantayuttaicchaaya vaa atthaa ^b^tumicchatthaa,^eb^ tena tumantarahitesu ``bhojanamicchatii''tiaadiisu na honti, ``vuttatthaanamappayogo''ti vaakyassa appayogo, dhaatvaadissa dvebhaave kate ^a^M0.0327^ea^ ``dutiyacatutthaana.m pa.thamatatiyaa''ti abbhaasa^b^bha^eb^kaarassa ^b^ba^eb^kaaro, dhaatvantassa ``ko khe caa''ti ^b^ka^eb^kaaro, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti iccaadi.
[03] ^b^ghasa^eb^ adane, ghasitumicchatiiti atthe chappaccayo, dvitta.m, tatiya ^b^ca^eb^vagga ikaara ^b^ca^eb^kaaraadesaa, jighacchati, jighacchanti.

[03] ^b^hara^eb^iccetassa dhaatussa sabbassa ^b^gii^eb^ hoti ^b^se^eb^ paccaye pare. ``giise''ti yogavibhaagena jissapi, .thaanuupacaarenaadesassaapi dhaatuvohaarattaa dvitta.m, bhikkha.m jigiisati, jigiisanti.
[03] ^b^su^eb^ sava.ne, sotumicchati sussuusati, sussuusanti, ``kvaci dhaatuu''tiaadinaa diigho.
[03] ^b^paa^eb^ paane, paatumicchatiiti atthe ^b^sa^eb^ppaccayadvittarassatta^b^i^eb^kaaraadesaa, ``tato paamaanaana.m vaama.m sesuu''ti ^b^vaa^eb^deso, pivaasati, pivaasanti iccaadi.
[03] sa"ngho pabbatamiva attaanamaacarati, pabbato iva aacaratiiti vaa atthe --

[03] aacara.nakriyaaya kattuno upamaanabhuutamhaa naamato ^b^aaya^eb^ppaccayo hoti aacaaratthe. upamiiyati etenaati ^a^M0.0328^ea^ upamaana.m, kattuno upamaana.m ^b^kattupamaana.m,^eb^ ``vuttatthaanamappayogo''ti ^b^iva^eb^saddanivatti, dhaatuppaccayantattaa ``tesa.m vibhattiyo lopaa caa''ti sutte ^b^tesa.m^eb^gaha.nena vibhattilopo, ``pakati cassa sarantassaa''ti pakatibhaavo, saralopaadi, ``dhaatuppaccayehi vibhattiyo''ti vibhattuppatti, pabbataayati sa"ngho, eva.m samuddamiva attaanamaacarati samuddaayati, cicci.tamiva attaanamaacarati cicci.taayati saddo. eva.m dhuumaayati.

[03] upamaanabhuutaa naamato ^b^iiya^eb^ppaccayo hoti aacaaratthe. puna ^b^upamaana^eb^ggaha.na.m ^b^kattu^eb^ggaha.nanivattanattha.m, tena kammatopi sijjhati, sesa.m sama.m. achatta.m chattamivaacarati chattiiyati, aputta.m puttamivaacarati puttiiyati sissamaacariyo.
[03] ^b^upamaanaa^eb^ti ki.m? dhammamaacarati, ^b^aacaare^eb^ti ki.m? achatta.m chattamiva rakkhati.
[03] naamamhaa attano icchatthe ^b^iiya^eb^ppaccayo hoti. attano pattamicchati pattiiyati, eva.m vatthiiyati, parikkhaariiyati, ciivariiyati, pa.tiiyati, dhaniiyati, puttiiyati.

[03] dhaatuyaa ruupe nipphaadetabbe, ``ta.m karoti, tena atikkamati''iccaadike payujjitabbe vaa sati naamamhaa ^b^.naya^eb^ppaccayo hoti, kaaritasa~n~naa ca. .nalope, vibhattilopasaralopaadiisu katesu vibhattuppatti, da.lhayati viiriya.m, eva.m pamaa.nayati, amissayati, tathaa hatthinaa atikkamati atihatthayati, vii.naaya upagaayati upavii.nayati, visuddhaa hoti ratti visuddhayati, kusala.m pucchati kusalayati iccaadi.

[03] sabbehi dhaatuuhi hetvatthe abhidheyye ^b^.ne .naya.naape .naapaya^eb^ iccete paccayaa paraa honti, te kaaritasa~n~naa ca honti. hetuyeva attho ^b^hetvattho,^eb^ so ca ``yo kaareti sa hetuu''ti laddhahetusa~n~no suddhakattuno payojako hetukattaa, atthato pesanajjhesanaadiko payojakabyaapaaro idha hetu naama.
[21] akammaa dhaatavo honti, kaarite tu sakammakaa.
[22] na bhaave suddhakattaa ca, kaarite kammasa~n~nito..

[03] tattha yo koci bhavati, tama~n~no ``bhavaahi bhavaahi'' icceva.m braviiti, atha vaa bhavanta.m bhavitu.m samattha.m payojayati, bhavitu.m payojetiiti vaa atthe iminaa ^b^.ne.naya^eb^ppaccayaa, kaaritasa~n~naa ca, ``vuttatthaanamappayogo''ti vaakyassa appayogo, ``kaaritaana.m .no lopa''nti ^b^.na^eb^lopo, ``asa.myogantassa vuddhi kaarite''ti ^b^uu^eb^kaara^b^sso^eb^kaaro vuddhi.
